analyzed: avijjaṇḍa kosam arahatta maggena padāletvā ariyāya jātiyā jāta ttā sabba sattānam seṭṭha jeṭṭha vuḍḍhatara bhāvam

original: Ayaṃ pana kamo abhidhammavibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ āgatakkamo.

original: Cutūpapātañāṇaṭṭhāne pana mūlapaṇṇāsapāḷiyaṃ mahāsīhanādasutte ca dasakanipātaaṅguttarapāḷiyaṃ

original: Vuṭṭhānanti yena kāraṇena jhānādīhi vuṭṭhahanti, taṃ kāraṇaṃ. Ñāṇanti yathābhūtaṃ

original: dasabalañāṇānīti daṭṭhabbāni.

original: Honti cettha –
analyzed: honti ca itthā

analyzed: indriya para aparam ca jhāna ādinam saṃkilesam

original: Vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ ñāṇaṃ, pubbenivāsānussatiṃ;

original: dasabalañhi sakasakakiccameva jānāti. Sabbaññutañāṇaṃ pana tampi tato avasesampi

original: vacanattho na kātabbo. Tassa pana ya oti padavibhāgo kātabbo. Tesu ca yasaddassa

original: vāccaṃ aniyamo buddhadabbo appadhānena labbhati, tassa yādisayuttajaccanāmagottasīlavihārī
analyzed: vāccam aniyamaḥ buddha dabbaḥ appadhānena labbhati tassa

original: gocarasaṅkhātaṃ aniyamasāmaññākārattaguṇameva padhānena labbhati. Paṭhamāsivibhattiyā
analyzed: gocara saṅkhātam aniyama sāmaññā kāra atta guṇam eva padhānena labbhati

original: kāriyabhūtassa okārassa vāccaṃ pakatūpanissayasaṅkhātaṃ kattukārakekavacanasaṅkhyaṃ
analyzed: kāriya bhūtassa okārassa vāccam pa katu upanissaya saṅkhātam kattu kāraka ikavacana saṅkhyam

original: labbhati. Atha vā sabbanāmabhāvaṃ yāti gacchatīti yo, aniyamavācakabhāvaṃ yāti gacchatīti
analyzed: labbhati atha vā sabba nāma bhāvam yāti gacchati iti yaḥ aniyama vācaka bhāvam yāti gacchati iti

original: vā yo, sabbanāma bhāvena yāti pavattatīti vā yo, sabbanāmabhāvena yātabbo ñātabboti
analyzed: vā yaḥ sabba nāma bhāvena yāti pavattati iti vā yaḥ sabba nāma bhāvena yātabbaḥ ñātabbaḥ iti

original: vā yo, yātabbo ñātabbo etena vā aniyamatthoti yo.
analyzed: vā yaḥ yātabbaḥ ñātabbaḥ etena vā aniyama ttho ti yaḥ

original: Tenāhu porāṇā –
analyzed: tena āhu porāṇā

original: “Nānākāraṇaṃ paṭicca, dhātupaccayaviggahaṃ;
analyzed: nānā kāraṇam paṭicca dhātu paccaya viggaham

original: Cintakānaṃ pabhāvova, padhānaṃ hoti cintane”ti.
analyzed: cintakānam padhānam hoti cintana iti

original: Buddhoti paṭividdhacatusaccadhammo. Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho. Bujjhati cattāri saccānīti

original: buddho, bhagavā. Suddhakattusādhanoyaṃ. Budhadhātu ta. Bodhetā pajāyāti vā buddho,
analyzed: buddhaḥ bhagavā pajāyāti vā buddhaḥ

original: hetu kattusādhanoyaṃ. Aññesaṃ cattāri saccāni bodhetīti attho. Atha vā anaññabodhito
analyzed: hetu aññesam cattāri saccāni bodheti iti atthaḥ atha vā anañña bodhitaḥ

original: hutvā savāsanāya sammohaniddāya bujjhati jāgarotīti buddho, dinakarakiraṇa samāgamena
analyzed: hutvā sa vāsanāya sammoha niddāya bujjhati jāgaroti iti buddhaḥ dinakara kiraṇa samāgamena

original: Tena vuttaṃ –

original: “Ñāṇe vikasane ceva, gamane cāpi jāgare;

original: Catūsvetesu atthesu, budhasaddo pavattatī”ti.
analyzed: catūsu etesu atthesu budha saddo pavattati iti

original: Atha vā sabbañeyyadhamme bujjhati jānātīti buddho, pārami bhāvitāya paññāya sabbe

original: Ettha ca buddho nāma sabbaññubuddha, paccekabuddha, catusaccabuddha, suta buddhavasena

original: Dhitimāññadhārakoti ettha dhitimā aññadhārakoti padacchedo kātabbo. Dhitimāti samādhivanto,

original: pavattamāne saṃsāravaṭṭe.

analyzed: pana nibbacanam kārita vasena vuttam yassa uppajjati tam dukkhitam karoti iti vuttam

original: Naradevamaṅgalanti naradevānaṃ maṅgalabhūtaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha vacanatto. Nirayaṃ neti

original: Vimānavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ netīti naro. Puttabhātubhūtopi hi puggalo

original: kīḷantīti devā. Divudhātu ṇa. Atha vā sarīrālaṅkārajutiyā dibbantīti devā. Devā ca

analyzed: pana upapatti devā adhippetā

original: tasmā buddhassa naradevamaṅgalanti thometīti adhippāyoti.

original: Tatiyavandanagāthāvaṇṇanā samattā.

original: Dehajjutiniggatapajjalantaṃ;

original: Paññādhitisīlaguṇoghavindaṃ,

original: Upetapuñño yo sugato varabodhimūle sasena māraṃ jinitvā aruṇodayamhi bodhiṃ abojjhi

original: Parasaddūpa pada munadhātu paricchindane kvi. Paraṃ ati viya sīlādiguṇagaṇaṃ attano

original: vā pāramī, hetukattusādhanoyaṃ.

analyzed: moneyya ādīsu vā aññatarena samannāgata ttā puggalo munī iti vuccati so pana esa agāriya muni

original: anagāriyamuni, sekkhamuni, asekkhamuni, paccekamuni, munimunīti anekavidho. Tattha

original: Sekkhamunīti sattasekkhā. Asekkhamunīti khīṇāsavo. Paccekamunīti paccekasambuddho.

analyzed: hoti tam maggaṅga nāvam

original: nibbāne ceva magge ca, catunnaṃ saccānaṃ kati kusalātiādīsu ariyasacce. Svāyamidhāpi
analyzed: nibbāne ca iva magge ca catunnam saccānam kati ariya sacce

original: ariyasacce vattatīti veditabbo. Sathanaṃ saccaṃ, avitathaṃ. Sathadhātu avitathe ṇyo.
analyzed: ariya sacce vattati iti veditabbaḥ sathanam saccam avitatham satha dhātu avitathe ṇyaḥ

original: Yathā hi aggīnaṃ sabhāvo ekantaṃ uṇhoyeva hoti, na sītalo, evaṃ dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādi
analyzed: yathā hi aggīnam sabhāvaḥ ekantam uṇhaḥ yā iva hoti na sītalaḥ evam dukkha ādīnam pīḷana ādi

original: sabhāvaṃ ekantaṃ saccaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ anaññathaṃ hoti. Taṃ pana catubbidhaṃ hoti
analyzed: sabhāvam ekantam saccam tatham avitatham anaññatham hoti tam pana catubbidham hoti

original: dukkhasaccaṃ, samudayasaccaṃ, nirodhasaccaṃ, maggasaccañcāti. Tattha dukkhasaccanti
analyzed: dukkha saccam samudaya saccam nirodha saccam magga saccañca ati tattha dukkha saccanti

original: dukkhacchitaṃ khaṃ tucchanti dukkhaṃ. Kammadhārayasamāsoyaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ saccavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: dukkha chitam kham tucchanti dukkham kammadhāraya samāsaḥ yam vuttam ha etam sacca vibhaṅga ṭṭhakathā ayam

original: “duiti ayaṃsaddo kucchite dissati. Kucchitañhi puttaṃ duputtoti vadanti. Khaṃsaddo
analyzed: ayam saddaḥ kucchite dissati kucchitam hi puttam du puttaḥ ti vadanti

original: pana tucche. Tucchañhi ākāsaṃ khanti vuccati. Idañca paṭhamasaccaṃ kucchitaṃ. Anekaupaddavādhiṭṭhānato,
analyzed: pana tucche tuccham hi ākāsam khanti vuccati idam ca paṭhama saccam kucchitam aneka opaddava adhiṭṭhānato

original: tucchaṃbālajanaparikappitadhuvasubhasukhattabhāvavirahitato. Tasmā kucchitattā tucchattā
analyzed: tasmā tuccha ttā

original: ca dukkhanti vuccatī”ti. Dukkhañca taṃ saccañcāti dukkhasaccaṃ. Tebhūmikavaṭṭaṃ labbhati.
analyzed: ca dukkham ti vuccati iti dukkham ca tam saccam ca ati dukkha saccam tebhūmika vaṭṭam labbhati

original: Samudayasaccanti ayati pavattati dukkhaphalaṃ etenāti ayo, lobho. Ayadhātu gatimhi
analyzed: samudaya saccanti ayati pavattati dukkha phalam etena ati ayaḥ lobhaḥ aya dhātu gatimhi

original: a. Saṃ avasesa paccayasaṃyoge sati u dukkhuppattiyā ayo kāraṇoti samudayo. Chaṭṭhītappurisasamāsoyaṃ.
analyzed: a saṃ avasesa paccaya saṃyoge sati dukkha uppattiyā kāraṇo ti samudayaḥ chaṭṭhī tappurisa samāsaḥ yaṃ

original: Vutteñhetaṃ sacca vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “saṃiti ca ayaṃsaddo samāgamo sametantiādīsu
analyzed: vuttena ha etam sat ca vibhaṅga ṭṭhakathā ayam sam iti ca ayam saddaḥ samāgamaḥ sameta ti ādīsu

original: saṃyogaṃ dīpeti. Uiti ayaṃsaddo uppannaṃ uditantiādīsu uppattiṃ. Ayasaddo pana kāraṇaṃ
analyzed: saṃyogam dīpeti u iti ayam saddaḥ uppannam udita nti ādīsu uppattim aya saddaḥ pana kāraṇam

original: dīpeti. Idañcāpi dutiyasaccaṃ avasesapaccayasamāyoge sati dukkhassuppattikāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: dīpeti idam ca api dutiya saccam avasesa paccaya samāyoge sati dukkhassa uppatti kāraṇam

original: Iti dukkhassa saṃyoge uppattikāraṇattā dukkhasamudayanti vuccatī”ti. Samudayo ca
analyzed: iti dukkhassa saṃyoge uppatti kāraṇa ttā dukkhasamudayanti vuccati iti samudayaḥ ca

original: so saccañcāti samudayasaccaṃ, lobhasaṅkhātā taṇhā labbhati. Nirodhasaccanti rodhati
analyzed: saḥ samudaya saccam lobha saṅkhātā taṇhā labbhati nirodha saccanti rodhati

original: carati pavattatīti rodho, tebhūmikavaṭṭadhammo. Rodhadhātu caraṇe ṇa. Natthi tebhūmikavaṭṭadhammassa
analyzed: carati pavattati iti rodhaḥ tebhūmika vaṭṭa dhammo rodha dhātu caraṇe na natthi tebhūmika vaṭṭa dhammassa

original: rodho caraṇaṃ etthāti nirodho, nibbānaṃ. Atha vā nirujjhati saṃsāradukkhaṃ etthāti
analyzed: rodhaḥ caraṇam ettha ati nirodhaḥ nibbānam atha vā nirujjhati saṃsāra dukkham ettha ati

original: nirodho, nibbānaṃ. Rudhidhātu āvaraṇe ṇa. Vuttañhetaṃ saccavibhaṅgaṭṭha kathāyaṃ
analyzed: nirodhaḥ nibbānam āvaraṇe

original: “tatiyasaccaṃ pana yasmā nisaddo abhāvaṃ. Rodha saddo cārakaṃ dīpeti. Tasmā abhāvo
analyzed: tatiya saccam pana yasmā nisaddaḥ abhāvam rodha saddaḥ cārakam dīpeti tasmā abhāvaḥ

original: ettha saṃsāra cārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā. Samadhi gate vā
analyzed: ettha saṃsāra cāraka saṅkhātassa dukkha rodhassa sabba gati suññattā samadhi gate vā

original: tasmiṃ saṃsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa abhāvo hoti tappaṭipakkhattātipi dukkhanirodhanti
analyzed: tasmin saṃsāra cāraka saṅkhātassa dukkha rodhassa abhāvaḥ hoti dukkha nirodhan ti

original: vuccatī”ti. Dukkhassa vā anuppādanirodhapaccayattā dukkhanirodhanti. Nirodho ca so
analyzed: vuccati iti dukkhassa vā anuppāda nirodha paccaya ttā dukkha nirodha nti nirodhaḥ ca so

original: saccañcāti nirodhasaccaṃ. Nibbānaṃ. Maggasaccanti dukkhanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ maggati
analyzed: saccañca ati nirodha saccam nibbānam magga saccanti dukkha nirodham nibbānam maggati

original: gacchati etenāti maggo. Aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. Maggadhātu gatiyaṃ a. Vuttañhetaṃ sacca
analyzed: gacchati etena ati maggaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ magga dhātu gatiyam a vuttam ha etam sacca

original: vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “catutthasaccaṃ pana yasmā etaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati ārammaṇavasena
analyzed: vibhaṅga ṭṭhakathā ayam catuttha saccam pana yasmai etam dukkha nirodham gacchati ārammaṇa vasena

original: tadabhimukhabhūtattā paṭipadā ca hoti dukkhanirodhappattiyā. Tasmā dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāti
analyzed: tad abhimukha bhūta ttā paṭipadā ca hoti dukkha nirodha ppattiyā tasmā dukkha nirodha gāmini paṭipadā ti

original: vuccatī”ti. Maggo ca so saccañcāti maggasaccaṃ. Aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo labbhati. Yasmā
analyzed: vuccati iti maggo ca so saccam ca ati magga saccam aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ labbhati yasmā

original: panetāni buddhādayo ariyā paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānītipi vuccanti. Atha vā
analyzed: pana etāni buddha ādayaḥ ariyā paṭivijjhanti tasmai ariya saccāni iti pi vuccanti atha vā

original: buddhādīhi ariyehi paṭivijjhiyanti, tasmā ariyasaccānītipi vuccanti.
analyzed: buddha ādīhi ariyehi tasmai ariya saccāni iti pi vuccanti

original: Tesaṃ pana lakkhaṇādīni evaṃ veditabbāni. Ettha hi bādhanalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ,
analyzed: tesam pana lakkhaṇa ādīni evam veditabbāni ettha hi bādhana lakkhaṇam dukkha saccam

original: santāpanarasaṃ, pavattipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, pabhavalakkhaṇaṃ samudayasaccaṃ, anupacchedakaraṇarasaṃ,
analyzed: santāpana rasam pavatti paccupaṭṭhānam pabhava lakkhaṇam samudaya saccam an upaccheda karaṇa rasam

original: palibodhapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Santilakkhaṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, accutirasaṃ, animittapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: palibodha paccupaṭṭhānam santi lakkhaṇam nirodha saccam accu tirasam animitta paccupaṭṭhānam

original: Niyyānalakkhaṇaṃ maggasaccaṃ, kilesappahāna karaṇarasaṃ, vuṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhānanti.
analyzed: niyyāna lakkhaṇam magga saccam kilesa ppahāna karaṇa rasam vuṭṭhāna paccupaṭṭhānam ti

original: Etesu pana catūsu saccesu paṭhamatatiyasaccāni phalāni honti. Dutiya catutthasaccāni
analyzed: etesu pana catūsu saccesu paṭhama tatiya saccāni phalāni honti dutiya catuttha saccāni

original: hetūni honti. Purimāni dvesaccāni dudda sattā gambhīrāni. Pacchimāni dvesaccāni gambhīrattā duddasāni.
analyzed: hetūni honti purimāni dvesaccāni dudda sa ttā gambhīrāni pacchimāni dvesaccāni gambhīra ttā duddasāni

original: Api ca kho pana dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ gambhīrañceva duddasañcāti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: api ca kho pana dukkha nirodham ariya saccam gambhīram ca iva duddasam ca ati veditabbam

original: Ekekassa pana saccassa catunnaṃ catunnaṃ atthānaṃ vasena soḷasa saccaṭṭhā honti.
analyzed: ekekassa pana saccassa catunnam catunnam atthānam vasena soḷasa saccaṭṭhāḥ honti

original: Tena vuttaṃ paṭisambhidā maggapāḷiyaṃ “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho
analyzed: tena vuttam paṭisambhidā magga pāḷiyam dukkhassa pīḷana ṭho saṅkhata ṭṭho santāpa ṭṭho

original: vipariṇāmaṭṭho, ime cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā. Evaṃ dukkhaṃ
analyzed: vipariṇāma aṭṭhaḥ ime cattāro dukkhassa dukkha aṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā evam dukkham

original: tathaṭṭhena saccaṃ. Samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho nidānaṭṭho saṃyogaṭṭho palibodhaṭṭho,
analyzed: tathaṭṭhena saccam samudayassa āyūhana ṭṭhaḥ nidāna ṭṭhaḥ saṃyoga ṭṭhaḥ palibodha ṭṭhaḥ

original: ime cattāro samudayassa samudayaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā. Evaṃ samudayo tathaṭṭhena
analyzed: ime cattāro samudayassa samudaya ṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā evam samudayaḥ tathaṭṭhena

original: saccaṃ. Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho vivekaṭṭho asaṅkhataṭṭho amataṭṭho, ime cattāro
analyzed: saccam nirodhassa nissaraṇa ṭṭhaḥ viveka ṭṭhaḥ asaṅkhata ṭṭhaḥ amata ṭṭhaḥ ime cattāro

original: nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā, evaṃ nirodho tathaṭṭhena saccaṃ.
analyzed: nirodhassa nirodha ṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā evam nirodhaḥ tathaṭṭhena saccam

original: Maggassa niyyānaṭṭho hetvaṭṭho dassanaṭṭho adhipateyyaṭṭho, ime cattāro maggassa
analyzed: maggassa niyyāna aṭṭhaḥ hetu aṭṭhaḥ dassana aṭṭhaḥ adhipateyya aṭṭhaḥ ime cattāro maggassa

original: maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā, evaṃ maggo tathaṭṭhena sacca”nti.
analyzed: magga ṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā evam maggo tatha ṭṭhena saccanti

original: Dassanaṃ dasaṃ, disati passatīti vā dasaṃ, catumaggañāṇaṃ. Disadhātu apekkhane a.
analyzed: dassanam dasam disati passati iti vā dasam catu magga ñāṇam disa dhātu apekkhane a

original: Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ dassanaṃ assāti catusaccadaso, jino. Atha vā cattāri saccāni adassi
analyzed: catunnam saccānam dassanam assāti catusaccadasaḥ jinaḥ atha vā cattāri saccāni adassi

original: apassīti catusaccadaso, jino. So cattāri saccāni catumaggañāṇena appaṭivijjhīti attho.
analyzed: apassi iti catusaccadasaḥ jino so cattāri saccāni catu magga ñāṇena appaṭivijjhi iti attho

original: Taṃ catusaccadasaṃ. Catusaccañāṇaṃ pana duvidhaṃ hoti anubodhañāṇañca, paṭivedha
analyzed: tam catusaccadasam catusacca ñāṇam pana duvidham hoti anubodha ñāṇam ca

original: ñāṇañcāti. Tattha anubodhañāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ anussavādivasena nirodhe magge ca pavattati,
analyzed: ñāṇam ca ati tattha anubodha ñāṇam lokiyam anussava ādi vasena nirodhe magge ca pavattati

original: paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ nirodhamārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccato cattāripi saccāni paṭivijjhati.
analyzed: paṭivedha ñāṇam lokuttaram nirodham ārammaṇam katvā kiccato cattāri pi saccāni paṭivijjhati

original: Yathāha yo bhikkhave dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passati. Dukkhanirodhampi
analyzed: yathā āha yaḥ bhikkhave dukkham passati dukkha samudayam pi so passati dukkha nirodham pi

original: passati, dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭi padampi passatīti sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ. Catusaccapaṭivedhañāṇaṃ
analyzed: passati dukkha nirodha gāmini paṭi padam pi passati iti sabbam vattabbam catu sacca paṭivedha ñāṇam

original: pana anubodhañāṇena vinā na pavattati, tasmā anubodha ñāṇatthāya pubbe catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: pana anubodha ñāṇena vinā na pavattati tasmai anubodha ñāṇa tthāya pubbe catu sacca kammaṭṭhānam

original: paṇḍitena samārambhi tabbanti. Nanu ca ariyasāvakā cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhanti.
analyzed: paṇḍitena samārambhi nanu ca ariyasāvakā cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhanti

original: Atha kasmā jinoyeva catusaccadasanti thomitoti. Bhagavā pana ariyasāvakehi visiṭṭhena
analyzed: atha kasmai bhagavā pana ariya sāvakehi

original: anaññopadesena arahattamaggañāṇena cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhanti. Tasmā bhagavāyeva
analyzed: anañña upadesena arahatta magga ñāṇena cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhanti tasmai bhagavāya eva

original: catusaccadasanti abhitthavitoti. Tattha pana ṭhapetvā taṇhañca nibbānañca avasesadhammā
analyzed: abhitthavitoti tattha pana ṭhapetvā taṇham ca nibbānam ca avasesa dhammā

original: dukkhasaccaṃ nāma. Aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritā samudayasaccaṃ nāma. Nibbānaṃ nirodha saccaṃ
analyzed: dukkha saccam nāma aṭṭhasata taṇhā vicaritā samudaya saccam nāma nibbānam nirodha saccam

original: nāma. Aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo maggasaccaṃ nāma. Vuttaṃ pana abhidhammatthasaṅgahe –
analyzed: nāma aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ maggasaccam nāma vuttam pana abhidhamma attha saṅgahe

original: “Dukkhaṃ tebhūmakaṃ vaṭṭaṃ, taṇhā samudayo bhave;
analyzed: dukkham tebhūmakam vaṭṭam taṇhā samudayaḥ bhave

original: Nirodho nāma nibbānaṃ, maggo lokuttaro mato”ti.
analyzed: nirodhaḥ nāma nibbānam maggo lokuttaraḥ mataḥ ti

original: Varamiddhigatanti varaṃ iddhigataṃ. Uttamaṃ atītabuddhānaṃ iddhiṃ pattanti attho.
analyzed: varam iddhi gatam ti varam iddhi gatam uttamam atīta buddhānam iddhim pattanti attho

original: Atha vā uttamānaṃ iddhīnaṃ patiṭṭhānabhūtanti attho. Ijjhanaṃ samijjhanaṃ iddhi,
analyzed: atha vā uttamānam iddhīnam patiṭṭhāna bhūtanti attho ijjhanam samijjhanam iddhi

original: ijjhati samijjhati nippajjatīti vā iddhi. Iddhividhañāṇañca arahattamaggo ca labbhati.
analyzed: ijjhati samijjhati nippajjati iti vā iddhi iddhividha ñāṇañca arahatta maggo ca labbhati

original: Vuttañhi visuddhimagge “tathā nekkhammaṃ ijjhatīti iddhīti ca arahattamaggo ijjhatīti
analyzed: vuttam hi visuddhi magge tathā nekkhammam ijjhati iti iddhi iti ca arahatta maggaḥ ijjhati iti

original: iddhī”ti ca. Atha vā ijjhanti sattā etāya iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi,
analyzed: iddhi iti ca atha vā ijjhanti sattāḥ etāya iddhāḥ vuddhāḥ ukkaṃsa gatāḥ honti iti iddhi

original: aṭṭhasamāpattiyo ca cattāro maggā ca labbhanti. Idhadhātu vuḍḍhiyanti paccayo. Atha
analyzed: aṭṭha samāpattiyaḥ ca cattāro maggā ca labbhanti idhadhātu vuḍḍhiyanti paccayaḥ atha

original: vā tapaccayo itthiliṅgajotako īpaccayo ca. Iddhiṃ agaminti iddhigato, jino. Atha
analyzed: vā ta paccayaḥ itthi liṅga jotakaḥ ī paccayaḥ ca iddhim agamin ti iddhi gataḥ jinaḥ atha

original: vā gacchati patiṭṭhahati etthāti gato, varānaṃ uttamānaṃ iddhīnaṃ gato patiṭṭhānabhūtoti
analyzed: vā gacchati patiṭṭhahati ettha ati gataḥ varānam uttamānam iddhīnam gataḥ patiṭṭhāna bhūtaḥ iti

original: varamiddhigato, jino. Taṃ varamiddhigataṃ. Kiñcāpi pana ariyasāvakā iddhippattā honti,
analyzed: varam iddhi gataḥ jino tam varam iddhi gatam kiñcā api pana ariya sāvakāḥ iddhippattāḥ honti

original: buddhā pana visesato etāya abhiññāya iddhā samiddhā vuddhā atiukkaṃsagatā honti,
analyzed: buddhā pana visesataḥ etāya abhiññāya iddhā samiddhā vuddhāḥ ati ukkaṃsa gatāḥ honti

original: tasmā buddhoyeva varamiddhigatanti abhitthavituṃ arahatīti veditabbo.
analyzed: tasmā buddhaḥ yā iva varam iddhi gatam ti abhitthavitum arahati iti veditabbaḥ

original: Naradevahitanti manussadevānaṃ lokiyalokuttara saṅkhātaṃ hitaṃ payojanaṃ dhāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: naradeva hitam ti manussa devānam lokiya lokuttara saṅkhātam hitam payojanam dhāraṇam

original: Tesaṃ pana attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Tibhavūpasamanti tibhavaupasamaṃ. Punabbhavābhinibbattiyā
analyzed: tesam pana atthaḥ heṭṭhā vuttaḥ yā iva ti bhava upasamanti ti bhava opasamam punabbhava abhinibbattiyā

original: abhāvato kāmarūpaarūpasaṅkhātehi tīhi bhavehi tīsu bhavesu punabbhavābhinibbattito
analyzed: abhāvataḥ kāma rūpa arūpa saṅkhātehi tīhi bhavehi tīsu bhavesu punabbhava abhinibbattitaḥ

original: vā upasamitaṃ nibbutaṃ niruddhanti attho. Bhavanti sattā etthāti bhavo, tayo bhavā
analyzed: vā upasamitam nibbutam niruddham ti atthaḥ bhavanti sattāḥ ettha ati bhavaḥ tayaḥ bhavā

original: tibhavā, tehi upasamitthāti tibhavūpasamo, jino. Taṃ tibhavūpasamaṃ. Bhagavato pana
analyzed: ti bhavā tehi ti bhava upasamaḥ jinaḥ tam ti bhava upasamam bhagavataḥ pana

original: bodhipallaṅkeva kāmarūpārūpasaṅkhātesu tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhijanakānaṃ avijjātaṇhāmūlakānaṃ
analyzed: bodhi pallaṅkā iva kāmarūpa arūpa saṅkhātesu tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhi janakānam avijjā taṇhā mūlakānam

original: puññādisaṅkhārānaṃ arahattamaggañāṇena niravasesaṃ pahīnattā punabbhavābhinibbatti
analyzed: puñña ādi saṅkhārānam arahatta magga ñāṇena niravasesam pahīna ttā punabbhava abhinibbatti

original: natthi. Tasmā bhagavantaṃyeva visesena tibhavūpasamanti thometīti vuttaṃ hoti. Jinanti
analyzed: natthi tasmā bhagavantam yeva visesena ti bhava upasamanti thometi iti vuttam hoti jinanti

original: Tīhi lokehīti sambandho. Tīhi kāmarūpārūpa lokehīti attho. Tassa pana vacanattho

original: heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Taṃ panetaṃ katvatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Tassa pana padassa nirupameyyāti

original: padena kattubhāvena sambandho. Nirupameyyatanti appameyyabhāvaṃ. Upamitabbanti upameyyaṃ.

original: Upapubba mādhātu pamāne ṇyo. Upameyyassa bhāvo upameyyataṃ. Natthi upameyyataṃ assa

original: pādacakkalakkhaṇarājiko labbhati. Tassa bhāvo nirupameyyataṃ. Taṃ pana padaṃ sampāpuṇe

original: Tasmā nirupameyyataṃ pāpuṇātīti.

original: Sabbalokamahitanti sabbalokena pūjitaṃ. Sabbena devamanussalokena mahitabbo pūjitabboti

original: sabbaloka mahito, nātho labbhati. Taṃ. Uppanne hi tathāgate ye keci mahesakkhā devamanussā

original: Asamanti sabbamanussadevabrahmehi asadisaṃ. Appaṭipuggalanti attho. Natthi samo sadiso

original: Puññamahatta thāmamahattaiddhimahatta yasamahatta paññāmahattānaṃ paramukkaṃsa gato

original: daṭṭhabbo. Tāya paññāpadīpajutiyā.

original: pajjoto. Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro pajjotā. Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave imesaṃ catunnaṃ pajjotānaṃ

original: yadidaṃ paññā pajjoto”ti.
analyzed: yat idam paññā pajjototi

original: Paññāpadīpajutiyā vihatandhakāranti ettha pana paññāpadīpa jutiyātiiminā buddhassa
analyzed: paññāpadīpa jutiyā vihata ndhakāram ti ettha pana buddhassa

original: arahattamaggañāṇaṃ mukhyena dasseti. Taṃ dassanena pāramīñāṇañca vipassanāñāṇañca

analyzed: nanu ca sabbesam pi khīṇāsavānam paññā padīpa jutiyā vihata ndhakāra tā sambhavati atha

original: netīti naro, manusso. Atha vā nariyati sakena kammena niyyatīti naro, manusso. Naradhātu
analyzed: neti iti naraḥ manussaḥ atha vā nariyati sakena kammena niyyati iti naraḥ manussaḥ nara dhātu

original: nayane a. Vuttañhi “kammena niyyati loko”ti. Kāmaguṇa jhānābhiññacittissariyādīhi
analyzed: nayane a vuttañhi kammena kāmaguṇa jhāna abhiñña cittissariya ādīhi

original: dibbanti kīḷantīti devā, tesu vā viharantīti devā, divudhātu kīḷādīsu ṇa. Narā ca
analyzed: dibbanti kīḷanti iti devā tesu vā viharanti iti devā ca

original: devā ca naradevā. Hinoti vaḍḍhatīti hitaṃ, phalaṃ. Hidhātu vaḍḍhane ta. Naradevānaṃ
analyzed: devā ca naradevā hinoti vaḍḍhati iti hitam phalam hidhātu vaḍḍhane naradevānam

original: hitaṃ naradevahitaṃ, taṃ āvahatīti naradevahitāvaho, buddho. Naradevahitasaddūpapadaāpubba
analyzed: hitam naradeva hitam tam āvahati iti naradeva hita āvahaḥ buddhaḥ

original: vahadhātu haraṇe ṇa. Buddho hi sabbadevamanussānaṃ lokiyalokuttarasampattiatthaṃ
analyzed: buddhaḥ hi sabba deva manussānam lokiya lokuttara sampatti attham

original: dhammadesanāya dhāretīti vuttaṃ hoti, taṃ naradevahitāvahaṃ. Kāruṇikamaggamananta
analyzed: dhamma desanāya dhāreti iti vuttam hoti tam naradeva hita āvaham kāruṇika maggam ananta

original: ñāṇanti ettha kāruṇikaṃ aggaṃ anantañāṇantipadacchedo. Tattha kāruṇikanti sabbasattesu
analyzed: ettha kāruṇikam aggam ananta ñāṇa nti padacchedo tattha kāruṇikam ti sabba sattesu

original: mahākaruṇāya yuttaṃ, mahākaruṇavantaṃ vā. Kiratīti karuṇā. Kiradhātu apanayane uṇapaccayo.
analyzed: mahā karuṇāya yuttam mahā karuṇavantam vā kirati iti karuṇā apanayane uṇa paccayaḥ

original: Paradukkhaṃ vikkhipati apanetīti attho.
analyzed: para dukkham vikkhipati apaneti iti attho

original: Atha vā kinātīti karuṇā. Kidhātu hiṃsāyaṃ ruṇapaccayo. Paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ
analyzed: atha vā kināti iti karuṇā hiṃsā ayam ruṇa paccayo para dukkhe sati kāruṇikam

original: hiṃsati vibādhatīti attho. Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā.
analyzed: hiṃsati vibādhati iti attho para dukkhe sati sādhūnam hadaya kampanam karoti iti vā karuṇā

original: Karadhātu uṇapaccayo. Atha vā kaṃ vuccati sukhaṃ, taṃ rundhatīti karuṇā. Kaṃsaddūpapada
analyzed: atha vā kam vuccati sukham tam rundhati iti karuṇā

original: rudhidhātu āvaraṇe yupaccayo. Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatā lakkhaṇā. Attasukhanirapekkhatāya
analyzed: āvaraṇe yu paccayaḥ esā hi para dukkha apanayana kāma tā lakkhaṇā atta sukha nirapekkha tāya

original: kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibādhatīti attho. Karuṇāya mahākaruṇāya yutto kāruṇiko.
analyzed: kāruṇikānam sukham rundhati vibādhati iti attho karuṇāya mahā karuṇāya yuttaḥ kāruṇikaḥ

original: Karuṇā assa atthīti vā kāruṇiko, buddho. Taṃ kāruṇitaṃ. Agganti jātipuñña guṇamahattabhāvena
analyzed: karuṇā assa atthi iti vā kāruṇikaḥ buddhaḥ tam kāruṇitam agganti jāti puñña guṇa mahatta bhāvena

original: sabbasattuttamaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ ajati gacchatīti aggo, buddho. Ajadhātu gatiyaṃ a.
analyzed: sabba satta uttamam seṭṭha bhāvam ajati gacchati iti aggaḥ buddhaḥ

original: Jassa go. Buddho hi asambhinnakhattiyavaṃse jātattā jātivasena ca pūritapāramīpuññattā
analyzed: jassa go buddhaḥ hi asambhinna khattiya vaṃse jāta ttā jāti vasena ca pūrita pāramī puñña ttā

original: puññavasena ca aparimitanirupamasīlādi guṇavisesena samannāgatattā guṇavasena ca
analyzed: puñña vasena ca aparimita nirupama sīla ādi guṇa visesena samannāgata ttā guṇa vasena ca

original: anantalokadhātūsu sabbasattuttamabhāvaṃ gacchatīti aggo. Nibbānaṃ ajati gacchatīti
analyzed: ananta lokadhātūsu sabba satta uttama bhāvam gacchati iti aggaḥ nibbānam ajati gacchati iti

original: vā aggo. Atha vā ajeti khepeti kileseti aggo, buddho. Ajadhātu khepane a. Taṃ aggaṃ.
analyzed: vā aggaḥ atha vā ajeti khepeti kileseti aggaḥ buddhaḥ khepane a tam aggam

original: Anantañāṇanti gaṇanavasena ca sabhāvavasena ca visayavasena ca antavirahitañāṇaṃ.
analyzed: ananta ñāṇanti gaṇana vasena ca sabhāva vasena ca visaya vasena ca anta virahita ñāṇam

original: Kenaci puggalena ñāṇena anantaṃ aparicchinnaṃ, sabbaññutañāṇavantaṃ vā. Natthi antaṃ
analyzed: kenacid puggalena ñāṇena anantam aparicchinnam sabbaññuta ñāṇavantam vā natthi antam

original: yassāti anantaṃ, ñāṇaṃ. Sabbañeyyadhammaṃ jānātīti ñāṇaṃ, sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. Anantaṃ
analyzed: yassa ati anantam ñāṇam sabba ñeyya dhammam jānāti iti ñāṇam sabbaññuta ñāṇam anantam

original: ñāṇaṃ yassa soti anantañāṇo, buddho. Buddhassa hi ñāṇaṃ koci manusso vā devo vā brahmā
analyzed: ñāṇam yassa saḥ ti ananta ñāṇaḥ buddhaḥ buddhassa hi ñāṇam koci manussaḥ vā devaḥ vā brahmā

original: vā ettakanti paricchindituṃ na sakkoti, tasmā anantaṃ aparimāṇaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: vā ettakam ti paricchinditum na sakkoti tasmai anantam aparimāṇam hoti iti vuttam hoti

original: Vuttañhetaṃ sāriputtattheraapadāne –
analyzed: vuttam ha etam sāriputta thera apadāne

original: “Sakkā samudde udakaṃ, pametuṃ aḷhakena vā;
analyzed: sakkā samudde udakam pametum aḷhakena vā

original: Natveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave”ti.
analyzed: natvā iva tava sabbaññu ñāṇam sakkā pametava iti

original: Kāruṇikamaggamanantañāṇanti ettha ca karuṇaggahaṇena sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ dasseti,
analyzed: kāruṇika maggam ananta ñāṇam ti ettha ca karuṇa ggahaṇena sammāsambodhiyāḥ mūlam dasseti

original: mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ dīpaṅkarapādamūle
analyzed: mahā karuṇā sañcodita mānasaḥ hi bhagavā saṃsāra paṅkataḥ sattānam samuddharaṇa attham dīpaṅkara pāda mūle

original: katābhinīhāro kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni anupubbena pāramiyo pūretvā
analyzed: kata abhinīhāraḥ kappa sata sahassa adhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni anupubbena pāramiyaḥ pūretvā

original: Tamatulamabhikantaṃ vandaneyyaṃ namāmi.

original: 16. Evaṃ pannarasamagāthāya buddhaṃ vanditvā idāni isipatana migadāye dhammacakkapavattanādiguṇehi

analyzed: racita ttā pannarasa kkharehi yuttā mālinī gāthā iti daṭṭhabbā vuttam hi vutta udaye

original: mālinībhogisīhī”ti. Tassattho. Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ bhogisīhi aṭṭhasattayatīhi yuttā
analyzed: mālinī bhogisīhi iti tassa atthaḥ yassam paṭipādam bhogisīhi yuttā

original: nāmāti. Ettha ca bhogisīhīti bhogaisīhīti padacchedo. Bhogasaddo aṭṭhasaṅkhyā vācako.
analyzed: nāma ati ettha ca bhogisīhī iti bhogaisīhī iti padacchedaḥ bhoga saddo aṭṭha saṅkhyā vācako

original: Isisaddo sattasaṅkhyāvācakoti daṭṭhabbo.

analyzed: khila saddo ha ittha avasesa vācakaḥ iti na khilam akhilam atha vā na khīyati iti akhilam

analyzed: sabbam na pubba khidhātu khaye laḥ guṇa saddassa vacana tthaḥ heṭṭhā akhilāni

original: Munindoti agāriyamuni, anagāriyamuni, sekkhamuni, asekkhamuni, pacceka munivasena

original: Vanamisipatanavhanti vanaṃ isipatanaavhanti padacchedo. Ettha vananti migadāyavanaṃ.

original: Tañhi vivekakāmehi vanitabbaṃ sambhajitabbaṃ etthāti vananti vuccati. Vanadhātu sambhattiyaṃ

analyzed: te patanti sannipatanti ettha ati isi patanam vanam

original: gatiyaṃ yu. Atha vā isīnaṃ patanaṃ isipatanaṃ, vanaṃ. Avhetabbaṃ voharitabbanti avhaṃ.
analyzed: gatiyam yu atha vā isīnam patanam isipatanam vanam avhetabbam voharitabbanti avham

original: saññatā, paccekabuddhādayo sādhū. Saṃpubbayamudhātu uparame ta. Tesaṃ saññatānaṃ.

original: Niketanti vasanaṭṭhānaṃ, rammaṇaṭṭhānaṃ vā. Nikitati nivasati rammati vā etthāti

original: Dhammacakkanti dhammacakkapavattanasuttaṃ. Ettha hi cakkasaddo sampattiyaṃ, lakkhaṇe,
analyzed: dhamma cakkanti dhamma cakka pavattana suttam ettha hi cakka saddo sampattiyam lakkhaṇe

analyzed: cakkāni jātāni iti ettha lakkhaṇe cakkam iva vahataḥ ettha rathaṅge catu cakkam

analyzed: nava dvāram ti ettha iriyāpathe dadam bhuñja mā ca pamādo cakkam vattaya sabba pāṇīnam ti

original: ettha dāne. Dibbacakkaratanaṃ pāturahosīti ettha ratanacakke. Mayā pavattitaṃ cakkanti
analyzed: ettha dāne dibba cakka ratanam pātuḥ ahosi iti ettha ratana cakke mayā pavattitam cakkan ti

original: ettha dhammacakke. Icchāhatassa posassa cakkaṃ bhamati matthaketi ettha khuracakke.
analyzed: ettha dhamma cakke icchā hatassa posassa cakkam bhamati matthake ti ettha khura cakke

original: Khurapariyantena cakkenāti ettha paharaṇacakke. Asanivicakkanti ettha asanimaṇḍale.
analyzed: khura pariyantena cakkena ati ettha paharaṇa cakke ettha asani maṇḍale

original: Idha panāyaṃ dhammacakke daṭṭhabbo. Tañhi satipaṭṭhānādidhammaṃ cakketi pavattetīti
analyzed: idha pana ayam dhammacakke daṭṭhabbaḥ tat hi sati paṭṭhāna ādi dhammam cakketi pavatteti iti

original: dhammacakkanti vuccati. Ariyasaccādidhammaṃ vā cakketi pavattetīti cakkanti. Atha
analyzed: dhammacakkanti vuccati ariya sacca ādi dhammam vā cakketi pavatteti iti cakkanti atha

original: vā dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṃ āṇācakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ. Dhammena ñāyena
analyzed: vā dhammataḥ an apeta ttā dhammañca tam āṇā cakkañca ati dhammacakkam dhammena ñāyena

original: cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ, tena vuttaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “dhammacakkanti kenaṭṭhena dhammacakkaṃ.
analyzed: cakkanti dhamma cakkam tena vuttam paṭisambhidā ayam dhamma cakkan ti kenaṭṭhena dhamma cakkam

original: Dhammañca pavatteti cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, cakkañca pavatteti dhammañcāti dhammacakkaṃ,
analyzed: dhammañca pavatteti cakkañca ati dhammacakkam cakkañca pavatteti dhammañca ati dhammacakkam

original: dhammena pavattetīti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammacariyāya pavattetīti dhammacakkaṃ, dhamme
analyzed: dhammena pavatteti iti dhamma cakkam dhamma cariyāya pavatteti iti dhamma cakkam dhamme

original: ṭhito pavattetīti dhammacakka”ntiādi. Api ca dhammacakkanti paṭivedhañāṇampi desanāñāṇampi.
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ pavatteti iti dhamma cakkanti ādi api ca dhamma cakkanti paṭivedha ñāṇam pi desanā ñāṇam pi

original: Tattha paṭivedhañāṇaṃ nāma yena ñāṇena bodhipallaṅke nisinno cattāri saccāni soḷasahākārehi
analyzed: tattha paṭivedha ñāṇam nāma yena ñāṇena bodhi pallaṅke nisinnaḥ cattāri saccāni soḷasahā ākārehi

original: saṭṭhinayasahassehi paṭivijjhi. Desanāñāṇaṃ nāma yena ñāṇena tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ
analyzed: saṭṭhi naya sahassehi paṭivijjhi desanā ñāṇam nāma yena ñāṇena ti parivaṭṭam dvādasa ākāram

original: dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Ubhayampetaṃ dasabalassa ure jātañāṇameva. Tesu pana dhammadesanāñāṇaṃ
analyzed: dhammacakkam pavattesi ubhayam petam dasabalassa ure jāta ñāṇam eva tesu pana dhamma desanā ñāṇam

original: adhippetaṃ. Suttaṃ pana ṭhānūpacārena dhammacakkanti vuccati. Pavattoti pañcavaggiyānaṃ
analyzed: adhippetam suttam pana ṭhāna upacārena dhammacakkan ti vuccati pavatto ti pañcavaggi yānam

original: bhikkhūnaṃ dveme bhikkhave antā pabbajitena na sevitabbātiādinā adesayi.
analyzed: bhikkhūnam dve ime bhikkhave antāḥ pabbajitena na sevitabbā ati ādinā adesayi

original: Tamatulamabhikantanti taṃ atulaṃ abhikantanti padacchedo. Ettha tanti munindaṃ. Atulanti
analyzed: tam atulam abhikantanti tam atulam abhikantanti ettha munindam atulanti

original: sīlādīhi guṇehi kenaci asadisaṃ. Natthi tulo sadiso puggalo etassāti atulo, munindo.
analyzed: sīla ādīhi guṇehi kenaci asadisam natthi tulaḥ sadisaḥ puggalaḥ etassa ati atulaḥ munindo

original: Tassa hi aparimāṇāsu loka dhātūsu sīlādīhi guṇehi sadiso puggalo natthi. Asadisehi
analyzed: tassa hi aparimāṇāsu loka dhātūsu sīla ādīhi guṇehi sadisaḥ puggalaḥ natthi asadisehi

original: buddhehi samoti attho. Abhikantanti sabbadevamanussehi ativiya kantaṃ kamanīyaṃ sarīravaṇṇavantaṃ.
analyzed: buddhehi samaḥ ti attho abhikantanti sabba deva manussehi ativiya kantam kamanīyam sarīra vaṇṇavantam

original: Atirekaṃ tusitabbasarīravaṇṇasampannaṃ vā. Abhikkantavaṇṇanti hi vattabbe chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ
analyzed: atirekam tusitabba sarīra vaṇṇa sampannam vā abhikkanta vaṇṇam ti hi vattabbe chanda anurakkhaṇa attham

original: kakāralopañca vaṇṇapadalopaṃ katvā vuttasandhivasena abhikantanti vuttaṃ. Uttarapadalopa
analyzed: kakāra lopam ca vaṇṇa pada lopam katvā vutta sandhi vasena abhikantanti vuttam uttara pada lopa

original: vasena vā. Munindassa pana sarīravaṇṇaṃ sabbadevamanussehi ativiya atirekaṃ vā kamiyati
analyzed: vasena vā munindassa pana sarīra vaṇṇam sabba deva manussehi ativiya atirekam vā

original: tosiyatīti abhikantanti vuccati. Abhipubbakamudhātu icchākantīsu ta. Abhikantaṃ vaṇṇaṃ
analyzed: abhikantanti vuccati icchā kantīsu abhikantam vaṇṇam

original: sarīravaṇṇaṃ yassa soti abhikanto, munindo. Tassa hi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi
analyzed: sarīra vaṇṇam yassa so ti abhikantaḥ muni indo tassa hi dvattiṃsa mahā purisa lakkhaṇehi

original: ca asītyānubyañjana lakkhaṇehi ca chabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi ca suvaṇṇavaṇṇena ca samannā gatattā
analyzed: ca lakkhaṇehi ca chabbaṇṇa raṃsīhi ca suvaṇṇa vaṇṇena ca samannā gata ttā

original: sarīrasobhaggappattito sabbadevamanussehi ativiya kamanīyo tuṭṭho sarīravaṇṇo atthīti

original: abhikantanti thometi. Taṃ abhikantaṃ. Vandaneyyanti devamanussānaṃ vandanārahaṃ.
analyzed: abhikantanti thome iti tam abhikantam vandaneyyanti deva manussānam vandanā raham

original: Tehi vanditabbaṃ vā, vandiyate thomiyate vā vandanaṃ. Bhāvasādhanoyaṃ. Vandadhātu
analyzed: tehi vanditabbam vā vandiyate thomiyate vā vandanam bhāva sādhanoyam vandadhātu

original: vadidhātu vā abhivādanathutīsu yu. Taṃ arahatīti vandaneyyo, munindo. Vandapadaṃ
analyzed: vadidhātu vai abhivādana thutīsu tam arahati iti vandaneyyaḥ

original: arahatitaddhite ṇeyyo.
analyzed: a rahati taddhite ṇeyyaḥ

original: Atha vā devamanussehi vanditabbaṃ thomitabbanti vā vandaneyyo, munindo. So hi ādimajjhapariyosāna
analyzed: atha vā deva manussehi vanditabbam thomitabbam ti vā vandaneyyaḥ munindo saḥ hi ādi majjha pariyosāna

original: guṇehi samannāgatattā sabbadevamanussānaṃ vandanāraho tehi vā vanditabbo hoti. Tattha
analyzed: guṇehi samannāgata ttā sabba deva manussānam vandanā rahaḥ tehi vā vanditabbaḥ hoti tattha

original: ca ādiguṇaṃ nāma karuṇānidānaṃ sīlaṃ pāṇātipātādiviratippavattito. Majjha guṇaṃ nāma

analyzed: samādhi jhāna ttaya yogato pariyosāna guṇam nāma paññā tatas uttari karaṇīya abhāvato ti

original: visesena bhagavato vandaneyyanti thometi. Ahaṃ tīhi dvārehi namāmi vandāmīti sambandho.
analyzed: visesena bhagavataḥ thoma iti aham tīhi dvārehi namāmi vandāmi iti sambandhaḥ

original: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Akhilanidhāno sabba lokiyalokuttarasaṅkhātānaṃ sīlasamādhipaññādiguṇa

analyzed: mantānam sādhūnam niketam vasana ṭhānam rammaṇa ṭhānam vā isi patana vham

analyzed: guṇehi kenaci asadisam abhikantam sabba deva manussehi ativiya kantam kamanīyam tuṭṭhi

original: taṃ munindaṃ ahaṃ tīhi dvārehi namāmi vandāmīti.

analyzed: soḷasama vandana gāthā vaṇṇanā samattā

analyzed: sura nara pūjitam sugatam ādaram namāmi

analyzed: evam soḷasama gāthāya munindam vanditvā idāni guṇehi

original: thomitvā vanditukāmo suciparivāritantyādigāthamāha. Ayaṃ pana na jabhajaragaṇehi
analyzed: vanditu kāmaḥ ayam pana na

original: ca ekagarunā ca racitattā soḷasakkharehi yuttāvāṇinīgāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi vuttodaye

original: nagaṇa jagaṇa bhagaṇa jagaṇa ragaṇā yadā gayuttā pādantagarunā saṃyogā ce siyuṃ,

analyzed: tadā sā vuttā vāṇinī vāṇinīgāthā nāma bhavati iti

original: Tattha suciparivāritanti rāgādimalavisuddhāhi ariyasāvakādiparisāhi parikkhāritaṃ
analyzed: tattha suci parivāritam ti rāga ādi mala visuddhāhi ariya sāvaka ādi parisāhi parikkhāritam

original: kilesamalavisuddhaṃ parikkhāravantaṃ vā. Rāgādimalehi sucati sujjhatīti suci, parisā.
analyzed: kilesa mala visuddham parikkhāravantam vā rāga ādi malehi sucati sujjhati iti suci parisā

original: Sucadhātu soceyye i. Parisamantato ariyabhikkhuādīhi deva manussehi vāriyati parikkhariyatīti

analyzed: parivāraḥ sugataḥ āvaraṇe parikkhāre vā na sucīhi parisāhi parivāritaḥ

original: suciparivārito, sugato. Tatiya tappurisasamāsoyaṃ. Bhagavato hi sadā rāgādimala visuddhehi
analyzed: sugataḥ bhagavataḥ hi sadā

original: ariyabhikkhuādīhi catūhi parisāhi aṭṭhahi parisāhi vā parivārito hotīti adhippāyo.

original: Atha vā suciparisuddhaṃ parivāritaṃ yassa soti suciparivārito, sugato. Surucirappabhāhīti

original: suṭṭhu kantitasarīranikkhanta byāmamattaraṃsīhi karaṇabhūtehi suṭṭhu ruciyati kamiyati
analyzed: suṭṭhu kantita sarīra nikkhanta byāma matta raṃsīhi karaṇa bhūtehi suṭṭhu

original: tusiyatīti surucirā, raṃsi. Supubba rucadhātu rocane iro. Pakārena bhāti dibbatīti
analyzed: tusiyati iti su rucirā raṃsi su pubba ruca dhātu rocane u pakārena bhāti dibbati iti

original: pabhā, raṃsi. Papubba bhādhātu dibbane kvi. Surucirā ca sā pabhā cāti surucirappabhā,
analyzed: pabhā raṃsi bhā dhātu dibbane kvi su rucirā ca sā pabhā ca ati su rucira ppabhā

original: tāhi surucirappabhāhi. Rattanti niccaṃ rañjitabbakāyaṃ. Rañjiyatīti ratto, kāyo.

original: Ranjadhātu rāge ta. Ratto kāyo yassa soti ratto, sugato. Uttarapadalopasamā soyaṃ.
analyzed: rāge rattaḥ kāyaḥ yassa saḥ ti rattaḥ sugataḥ uttara pada lopa samā sā ayam

original: Rūpassa bhavo rūpaṃ viya, taṃ rattaṃ. Bhagavato hi sarīrato niccaṃ nikkhantehi byāmamattaraṃsīhi
analyzed: rūpassa bhavaḥ rūpam viya tam rattam bhagavataḥ hi sarīrataḥ niccam nikkhantehi byāma matta raṃsīhi

original: rañjitabbo rūpakāyo atthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: rañjitabbaḥ rūpa kāyaḥ atthi iti vuttam hoti

original: Sirivisarālayanti paññāpuññasaṅkhātalakkhisamūhānaṃ patiṭṭhānaṃ. Ettha ca sirīti

original: paññāpuññānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Atha vā puññanibbattā sarīrasobhaggādisampatti. Sā
analyzed: adhivacanam atha vā puñña nibbattā sarīra sobhagga ādi sampatti sā

original: hi katapuññe siyati nissayati, katapuññehi vā siyati nissiyatīti sirīti vuccati,
analyzed: hi kata puññe siyati nissayati kata puññehi vā siyati nissiyati iti sirī iti vuccati

original: paññāpuññaṃ, issariyaṃ vā. Sarīrasobhaggādi sampatti vā labbhati. Vuttañhi vimānavatthuaṭṭhakathādīsu
analyzed: paññāpuññam issariyam vā sarīra sobhagga ādi sampatti vā labbhati vuttam hi vimāna vatthu aṭṭhakathā ādīsu

original: “sirīti buddhipuññānaṃ adhivacananti ca. Sirīti issariyanti ca sirīti rūpakāyasampattī”ti
analyzed: sirī iti buddhi puññānam adhivacananti ca sirī iti issariyanti ca sirī iti rūpa kāya sampattī iti

original: ca. Sidhātu sevāyaṃ, rapaccayo ca, itthiliṅgajotakaīpaccayo ca. Sirīti hi dīghavasena
analyzed: ca si dhātu seva ayam ra paccayaḥ ca itthi liṅga jotaka ī paccayaḥ ca si ri iti hi dīgha vasena

original: vattabbe gāthābandhattā chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ rassavasena vuttaṃ. Visarālayanti visaraālayanti
analyzed: vattabbe gāthā bandha ttā chanda anurakkhaṇa attham rassa vasena vuttam

original: padacchedo. Visaroti samūho. Visanti pavisanti avayavā yasmiṃ samūheti visaro, samūho.
analyzed: padacchedaḥ samūhaḥ visanti pavisanti avayavāḥ yasmin samūha iti visaraḥ samūhaḥ

original: Visadhātu pavesane arapaccayo. Atha vā visaranti samosaranti avayavā yasminti visaro.
analyzed: visadhātu pavesane ara paccayaḥ atha vā visaranti samosaranti avayavāḥ yasmin ti visaraḥ

original: Vipubba saradhātu samosaraṇe a. Potthakesu pana visayāla yanti yakārena pāṭho dissati.
analyzed: vipubba sara dhātu samosaraṇe a potthakesu pana yakārena pāṭhaḥ dissati

original: Na so yujjati. Kasmā, visarasaddasseva samūhavācakattā. Vuttañhi abhidhānappa dīpikāyaṃ –

original: “Samūho gaṇasaṅghātā,
analyzed: samūhaḥ gaṇa saṅghātā

original: Samudāyo ca sañcayo;
analyzed: samudāyaḥ ca sañcayaḥ

original: Sandoho nivaho ogho,
analyzed: sandohaḥ nivahaḥ oghaḥ

original: Visaro nikaro cayo”tyādi.
analyzed: visaraḥ nikaraḥ caya utyādi

original: Ālayanti patiṭṭhānaṃ. Ālayanti patiṭṭhanti etthāti ālayo, sugato. Āpubba lidhātu
analyzed: ālayanti patiṭṭhānam ālayanti patiṭṭhanti ettha ati ālayaḥ sugataḥ

original: alliyane ṇa. Sirīnaṃ paññāsaṅkhātalakkhīnaṃ visaro samūho sirīvisaro, tesaṃ ālayo

original: saṃvaritabbehi cakkhādīhi chahi indriyehi upetaṃ samupetaṃ samannāgataṃ. Gupiyanti

analyzed: indriyāni gupitāni indriyāni gupitam indriyāni cakkha ādi indriyāni

analyzed: labbhanti tehi upeti sampajjati iti upetaḥ sugataḥ upapubbaḥ gatiyam

original: upetaṃ. Kiñcāpi buddhato aññehi ariyasāvakādīhi puggalehi cakkhādiindriyāni rakkhitāni.
analyzed: upetam kiñcā api buddhataḥ aññehi ariyasāvaka ādīhi puggalehi cakkha ādi indriyāni rakkhitāni

original: Buddhoyeva pana bodhipallaṅke saha vāsanāya sabba kilesānaṃ arahattamaggena viddhaṃsitattā

analyzed: puñña bījassa khetta bhūtam puññatthikānam puñña bījassa vapana ṭhānam khetta bhūtam

original: vā, attano kārakaṃ pavati sodhetīti puññaṃ, kusalaṃ. Pudhātu sodhane ṇyo. Atha vā
analyzed: vā kārakam pavati sodheti iti puññam kusalam atha vā

original: paraṃ pujjabhāvaṃ janetīti puññaṃ, sadā pūjitaṃ vā janetīti puññaṃ, kusalaṃ. Pūjasaddūpapada
analyzed: param pujja bhāvam janeti iti puññam sadā pūjitam vā janeti iti puññam kusalam

original: janadhātu ṇyo. Niruttinayena saddasiddhi veditabbā. Avasesaṃ apuññaṃ punāti sodhetīti
analyzed: jana dhātu ṇyaḥ nirutti nayena veditabbā avasesam apuññam punāti sodheti iti

original: vā puññaṃ, kusalaṃ. Pudhātu sodhane ṇyo. Khittaṃ vuttaṃ bījaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti khettaṃ,
analyzed: vā puññam kusalam pudhātu sodhane ṇyaḥ khittam vuttam bījam tāyati rakkhati iti khettam

original: kedārādi. Khipasaddūpapada tādhātu rakkhane kvi. Bījāni vapantānaṃ manussānaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena
analyzed: kedāra ādi tā dhātu rakkhane kvi bījāni vapantānam manussānam mahat phala bhāva karaṇena

original: bījaṃ rakkhatīti attho. Atha vā khipanti vapanti ettha bījānīti khettaṃ. Khipadhātu
analyzed: bījam rakkhati iti attho atha vā khipanti vapanti ettha bījāni iti khettam khipa dhātu

original: peraṇe khepe vā ta. Khettaṃ viyāti khetto. Dhammarājā. Nītatthena pana puññabījāni

original: vapantānaṃ sattānaṃ mahapphala bhāvakaraṇena khittaṃ vuttaṃ puññabījaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti

original: khetto. Atha vā nibbānatthikehi puññabījāni khipiyanti vapiyanti etthāti khetto.
analyzed: khetto atha vā nibbāna atthikehi puñña bījāni khipiyanti vapiyanti ettha ati khetto

original: Dhammarājāti kātabbo. Puññānaṃ khettaṃ puññakkhetto, dhammarājā. Yathā hi rañño vā

original: amaccādīnaṃ vā sālīnaṃ vā yavānaṃ vā virūhanaṭṭhānaṃ rañño vā amaccādīnaṃ vā sālikhettaṃ
analyzed: amacca ādīnam vā sālīnam vā yavānam vā virūhana ṭhānam raññaḥ vā amacca ādīnam vā sa āli khettam

original: yavakhettanti vuccati. Evaṃ dhammarājā sabbalokassa puññamahabbalabhāvakaraṇena puññānaṃ

original: puññāni virūhanti, tasmā dhammarājā puññakkhettanti abhitthavitoti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ puññakkhettaṃ.

original: Paramasukhadanti uttamaṃ nibbānasukhaṃ dadamānaṃ. Vuttañhi “nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha”nti.
analyzed: parama sukha danti uttamam nibbāna sukham dadamānam vuttam hi nibbānam paramam sukhanti

original: Ettha ca paramasaddo uttamatthavācako anipphannapāṭi padiko. Atha vā paraṃ atirekaṃ

analyzed: ariyehi mānitabbanti paramam nibbānam parapubbam ādhātu māne a pakārena ariyehi

original: Tassa sukhaṃ paramasukhaṃ. Paramaṃ uttamaṃ vā sukhaṃ paramasukhaṃ. Taṃ dadātīti paramasukhado,

original: dhammarājā. Paramasukhasaddūpapada dādhātu dāne kvi. Dhammarājā pana veneyyasattānaṃ
analyzed: dhamma rājā dādhātu dāne kvi dhamma rājā pana veneyya sattānam

original: dhammadesanāya ca catupaccayappaṭiggahaṇena ca nibbānasukhaṃ detīti vuttaṃ hoti.

original: Taṃ paramasukhadaṃ. Dhammarājanti buddhaṃ. So hi lokiya lokuttaradhammehi devamanussānaṃ

original: rañjeti tosetīti dhammarājāti. Atha vā pāramīdhammeneva buddhattaṃ patvā rājā jātoti

original: dhammarājāti. Pāramīdhammeneva jāto vā rājāti dhammarājāti ca vuccati. Taṃ dhammarājaṃ

original: ahaṃ namāmīti sambandho.
analyzed: aham namāmi iti sambandhaḥ

analyzed: ettha ettha

original: Atha vā parisamantato kulaṃ pakiṇṇaṃ aññamaññamissakaṃ yamakaṃ yamakaṃ udakajālaaggijālavantanti
analyzed: atha vā parisamantataḥ kulam pakiṇṇam aññam añña missakam yamakam yamakam udaka jāla aggi jālavantanti

original: attho. Ābhuso kulati udakaggijālaṃ aññamaññamissakaṃ karotīti ākulaṃ, udakaggijālaṃ.
analyzed: udakaggi jālam aññamañña missakam karoti iti ākulam udakaggi jālam

original: Āpubbakuladhātu karaṇe a. Ābhusaṃ kulati bandhati aññamaññanti vā ākulaṃ. Atha vā
analyzed: ā pubba kula dhātu karaṇe a ābhusam kulati bandhati aññamaññanti vā ākulam atha vā

original: āsamantato kulati yamakaṃ yamakaṃ udakaggijālaṃ pavattatīti ākulaṃ, udakaggijālaṃ.
analyzed: āsamantataḥ kulati yamakam yamakam udakaggi jālam pavattati iti ākulam udakaggi jālam

original: Udakajālaṃ aggijālena aggijālañca udakajālena sammisso hotīti attho. Ananti jīvanti
analyzed: udaka jālam aggi jālena aggi jālam ca udaka jālena sammissaḥ hoti iti atthaḥ ananti jīvanti

original: etena sattāti aṇṇaṃ, udakaṃ. Anadhātu jīvāyaṃ a. Nassa ṇo. Tassa dvittaṃ. Dvibhāvo
analyzed: etena aṇṇam udakam jīvāyam a nassa no tassa dvittam dvi bhāvaḥ

original: vā. Atha vā arati gacchati taṃ taṃ ṭhānanti aṇṇaṃ. Aradhātu gatimhito. Tassa annādeso,
analyzed: vā atha vā arati gacchati tam tam ṭhānanti aṇṇam tassa anna ādeso

original: dhātvantalopo, nnassa ṇṇattaṃ. Aṇṇassa dhāraṃ aṇṇaṃ. Uttarapadalopena. Kuṭilabhāvena
analyzed: dhātu anta lopaḥ annassa annattam annassa dhāram annaṃ uttara pada lopena kuṭila bhāvena

original: ajati gacchatīti aggi, ajadhātu gatiyaṃ i. Jassa ggo. Jalati dibbatīti jālaṃ, sikhaṃ.
analyzed: ajati gacchati iti aggi ajadhātu gatiyam i jassa ggaḥ jalati dibbati iti jālam sikham

original: Jaladhātu dittiyaṃ ṇa. Aggino jālaṃ aggijālaṃ. Aṇṇañca aggijālañca aṇṇaggijālaṃ,
analyzed: jala dhātu dittiyam na agginaḥ jālam aggi jālam aṇṇam ca aggi jālam ca aṇṇaggi jālam

original: ākulaṃ parikiṇṇaṃ aṇṇaggijālaṃ assāti ākulaṇṇaggijālaṃ, yamaka pāṭiheraṃ labbhati.
analyzed: ākulam parikiṇṇam aṇṇaggi jālam assa ati ākula aṇṇaggi jālam labbhati

original: Taṃ ākulaṇṇaggijālaṃ.
analyzed: tam ākulaṇṇaggi jālam

original: Dujjāladdhaṃsanti duṭṭhu diṭṭhivādasaṅkhātajālaṃ viddhaṃsitaṃ. Duṭṭhu jalati bandhati
analyzed: duṭṭhu diṭṭhivāda saṅkhāta jālam vid haṃsitam duṭṭhu jalati bandhati

original: saṃsāravaṭṭeti dujjālaṃ, diṭṭhivādajālaṃ. Titthiya vādo hi natthi dinnantiādinayapavatto
analyzed: saṃsāra vaṭṭeti dujjālam diṭṭhi vāda jālam titthiya vādaḥ hi natthi dinna nti ādi naya pavatto

original: saṃsārato nissaritumappadānavasena jālasadisattā dujjālanti attho. Dupubba jaladhātu
analyzed: saṃsārataḥ nissaritum appadāna vasena jāla sadisa ttā dujjālanti atthaḥ jala dhātu

original: bandhane ṇo. Taṃ dhaṃsati viddhaṃsatīti dujjāladdhaṃsaṃ, yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ. Munibhijahitanti
analyzed: bandhane ṇo tam dhaṃsati vid haṃsati iti yamaka pāṭihāriyam

original: munibhi ajahitanti padacchedo. Tattha munibhīti sabbasammāsambuddhehi. Te hi monaṃ
analyzed: munibhi padacchedaḥ tattha munibhi iti sabba sammāsambuddhehi te hi monam

original: vuccati sabbaññutañāṇaṃ, taṃ etesaṃ atthīti munīti vuccanti. Kāyamoneyya vacīmoneyya
analyzed: vuccati sabbaññuta ñāṇam tam etesam atthi iti munī iti vuccanti kāya moneyya vacī moneyya

original: manomoneyyaṃ etesaṃ atthīti vā muni. Assatthitaddhite ṇīpaccayo. Atha vā idhaloka
analyzed: etesam atthi iti vā muni assa atthi taddhite ṇī paccayaḥ atha vā idha loka

original: paralokaṃ attahita parahitaṃ hitāhitañca munanti jānantīti munīti vuccanti. Tehi munībhi.
analyzed: para lokam atta hita para hitam hita ahitañca munanti jānanti iti munī iti vuccanti tehi

original: Ajahitanti avijahitaṃ apariccattaṃ vā, hātabbaṃ cajitabbanti jahitaṃ. Hādhātu cāge
analyzed: a jahitanti a vijahitam a pariccattam vā hātabbam cajitabbam ti jahitam hādhātu cāge

original: ta. Na jahitaṃ ajahitaṃ, pāṭiheraṃ. Taṃ ajahitaṃ. Bhagavato hi sāvatthinagarassa
analyzed: na jahitam a jahitam pāṭiheram tam a jahitam bhagavataḥ hi sāvatthi nagarassa

original: dakkhiṇadvāre kaṇḍambarukkhamūle kataṃ pāṭihāriyañca bhagavā pana tasmiṃ pāṭihāriyāvasāne
analyzed: dakkhiṇa dvāre kaṇḍamba rukkha mūle katam pāṭihāriyam ca bhagavā pana tasmim pāṭihāriya avasāne

original: tāvatiṃsapuraṃ gato, tasmiṃ pārichattakamūlamhi paṇḍukambalanāmake silāsane sannisinno
analyzed: tāvatiṃsapuram gataḥ tasmin pārichattaka mūlamhi paṇḍukambala nāmake silāsane sannisinnaḥ

original: devānaṃ abhidhammakathāya desanā ca sabbasammāsambuddhehi avijahitā dhammatāyeva
analyzed: devānam abhidhamma kathāya desanā ca sabba sammāsambuddhehi a vijahitā dhamma tāya iva

original: hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Buddhavaṃsaṭṭhakathāyañhi samatiṃsadhammatāpakāsane sāvatthi
analyzed: hoti iti vuttam hoti buddha vaṃsa ṭṭhakathāyan hi sama tiṃsa dhamma tā apakāsane sāvatthi

original: nagaradvāre yamakapāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ. Tāvatiṃse bhavane abhidhammadesanāti dhammatābhāvena
analyzed: nagara dvāre yamaka pāṭihāriya karaṇam tāvatiṃse bhavane abhidhamma desanā ati dhamma tā bhāvena

original: vuttaṃ. Tasmā pāṭiheraṃ munībhijahitanti thometi.
analyzed: vuttam tasmā thoma iti

original: Pāṭiheranti paccanīkapaṭiharaṇavasena pāṭihāriyaṃ, paṭipakkhe titthiye madditvā hinoti
analyzed: pāṭiheranti paccanīka paṭiharaṇa vasena pāṭihāriyam paṭipakkhe titthiye madditvā hinoti

original: pavattatīti pāṭiheraṃ. Paṭipubbahidhātu gatiyaṃ ṇo. Hissa heraṇideso. Atha vā bhagavato

original: ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhe titthiye harati apanetīti pāṭiheraṃ, iddhividhañāṇaṃ.
analyzed: ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhe titthiye harati apaneti iti pāṭiheram iddhividha ñāṇam

original: Paṭipubbaharadhātu apanayane ṇo. Paṭiharati apaneti sattānaṃ diṭṭhimānopagatāni cittānīti
analyzed: paṭi pubba hara dhātu apanayane ṇo paṭiharati apaneti sattānam diṭṭhi māna upagatāni cittāni iti

original: vā pāṭiheraṃ. Appasannānaṃ pasādaṃ āharatīti vā pāṭiheraṃ. Samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese

analyzed: kata kiccena paṭi pacchā haritabbam pavattetabbam iti vā pāṭiheram paṭi iti hi ayam saddaḥ

original: pacchāti etassa atthaṃ bodheti. Tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi añño āgacchi brāhmaṇotiādīsu
analyzed: pacchā ati etassa attham bodheti tasmin paṭipaviṭṭhamhi aññaḥ āgacchi brāhmaṇa uti ādīsu

original: viya. Atha vā paṭipunappunaṃ udakaggijālaṃ abbocchinnaṃ yamakaṃ yamakaṃ hutvā harati
analyzed: atha vā paṭipunappunam udakaggi jālam abbocchinnam yamakam yamakam hutvā harati

original: pavattatīti pāṭiheraṃ, yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ. Tañca pana iddhipāṭihāriya, ādesanāpāṭihāriya,

original: anusā sanī pāṭihāriyavasena tividhaṃ hoti. Tesu pana idha iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ adhippetanti.
analyzed: anusā sanī pāṭihāriya vasena tividham hoti tesu pana idha iddhi pāṭihāriyam adhippetanti

original: Sīghanti khippaṃ āsuṃ lahuṃ vā. Taṃ pana akāsītipade kriyāvisesanaṃ. Seti lahu hutvā
analyzed: khippam āsum lahum vā tam pana akāsi iti pade kriyā visesanam seti lahu hutvā

original: pavattatīti sīghaṃ. Sidhātu gatimhi ghapaccayo. Dīgho. Akāsīti akari.
analyzed: pavattati iti sīgham si dhātu gatimhi gha paccayaḥ dīghaḥ akāsi iti akari

original: Ettha ca pāṭihāriyamevaṃ veditabbaṃ. Bhagavā hi abhisambodhito sattame saṃvacchare
analyzed: ettha ca pāṭihāriyam evam veditabbam bhagavā hi abhisambodhitaḥ sattame saṃvacchare

original: sāvatthinagarassa dakkhiṇadvāre kaṇḍambarukkhamūle devānamindena sakkena āṇāpitena
analyzed: sāvatthi nagarassa dakkhiṇa dvāre kaṇḍamba rukkha mūle devānamindena sakkena āṇāpitena

original: visukammadevaputtena nimmite dvādasayojane ratana maṇḍape bhagavatā nimmite yojanappamāṇe

original: ratanapallaṅke ratanacaṅkame ca nisīditvā tiyojanike dibbasetacchatte dhārayamāne

original: uparimakāyato udakadhārā. Puratthimakāyato aggikkhandho, pacchimakāyato udakadhārā.

original: Pacchimakāyato aggikkhandho, puratthimakāyato udakadhārā, dakkhiṇaakkhito aggikkhandho,

original: vāmaakkhito udakadhārā. Vāmaakkhito aggikkhandho, dakkhiṇaakkhito udakadhārā. Dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotato
analyzed: vāma akkhitaḥ udaka dhārā vāma akkhitaḥ aggi kkhandho dakkhiṇa akkhitaḥ udaka dhārā dakkhiṇa kaṇṇa sotato

original: aggikkhandho, vāmakaṇṇasotato udakadhārā. Vāmakaṇṇasotato aggikkhandho, dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotato

original: udakadhārā. Dakkhiṇa nāsikāsotato aggikkhandho, vāmanāsikāso tato udakadhārā. Vāmanāsikāsotato
analyzed: udaka dhārāḥ aggi kkhandho vāma nāsikāso tatas udaka dhārāḥ vāma nāsikāso tatas

analyzed: aggi khandhaḥ dakkhiṇa nāsikā sotataḥ udaka dhārā dakkhiṇa aṃsa kūṭataḥ aggi khandhaḥ vāma aṃsa kūṭataḥ

original: udakadhārā. Vāmaaṃsakūṭato aggikkhandho, dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭato udakadhārā. Dakkhiṇahatthato
analyzed: udaka dhārā vāma aṃsa kūṭataḥ aggi kkhandhaḥ dakkhiṇa aṃsa kūṭataḥ udaka dhārā dakkhiṇa hatthato

original: aggikkhandho, vāmahatthato udakadhārā. Vāmahatthato aggikkhandho, dakkhiṇahatthato
analyzed: aggi kkhandho vāma hatthataḥ udaka dhārā vāma hatthataḥ aggi kkhandho dakkhiṇa hatthato

original: udakadhārā. Dakkhiṇapassato aggikkhandho, vāmapassato udakadhārā. Vāmapassato aggikkhandho,
analyzed: udaka dhārā dakkhiṇa passataḥ aggi kkhandho vāma passataḥ udaka dhārā vāma passataḥ aggi kkhandho

original: dakkhiṇapassato udakadhārā. Dakkhiṇapādato aggikkhandho, vāmapādato udakadhārā. Vāmapādato
analyzed: dakkhiṇa passataḥ udaka dhārā dakkhiṇa pādataḥ aggi kkhandho vāma pādataḥ udaka dhārā vāma pādataḥ

original: aggikkhandho, dakkhiṇapādato udakadhārā. Aṅgulaṅgulehi aggikkhandho, aṅgulantarikāhi
analyzed: aggi kkhandhaḥ dakkhiṇa pādataḥ udaka dhārā aṅgula aṅgulehi aggi kkhandhaḥ aṅgulantarikāhi

original: udakadhārā. Aṅgulantarikāhi aggikkhandho, aṅgulaṅgulehi udakadhārā. Ekekalomato aggikkhandho,
analyzed: udaka dhārāḥ aṅgula antarikāhi aggi kkhandhaḥ aṅgula aṅgulehi udaka dhārāḥ ekeka lomataḥ aggi kkhandhaḥ

original: ekekalomato udakadhārā. Lomakūpato lomakūpato aggikkhandho, lomakūpato lomakūpato
analyzed: ekeka lomataḥ udaka dhārā lomakūpataḥ lomakūpataḥ aggi khandho lomakūpataḥ lomakūpataḥ

original: udakadhārā pavattati. Channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ nīlānaṃ pītānaṃ lohitakānaṃ odātānaṃ mañjaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: udaka dhārā pavattati channam vaṇṇānam nīlānam pītānam lohitakānam odātānam mañjaṭṭhānam

original: pabhassarānaṃ ubbahanabhūtānaṃ yamakā yamakā vaṇṇā pavattanti. Bhagavā caṅkamati,
analyzed: pabhassarānam ubbahana bhūtānam yamakāḥ yamakāḥ vaṇṇāḥ pavattanti bhagavā caṅkamati

original: nimmito tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Bhagavā tiṭṭhati, nimmito caṅkamati
analyzed: nimmitaḥ tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyam vā kappeti bhagavā tiṭṭhati nimmitaḥ caṅkamati

original: vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Bhagavā nisīdati, nimmito caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati

original: vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Bhagavā seyyaṃ kappeti, nimmito caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati
analyzed: vā seyyam vā kappeti bhagavā seyyam kappeti nimmitaḥ caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati

original: vā. Nimmito caṅkamati, bhagavā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Nimmito
analyzed: vā nimmitaḥ caṅkamati bhagavā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyam vā kappeti nimmitaḥ

original: tiṭṭhati, bhagavā caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Nimmito nisīdati, bhagavā
analyzed: tiṭṭhati bhagavā caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyam vā kappeti nimmitaḥ nisīdati bhagavā

original: caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Nimmito seyyaṃ kappeti, bhagavā caṅkamati
analyzed: caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā seyyam vā kappeti nimmitaḥ seyyam kappeti bhagavā caṅkamati

original: vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vāti vividhaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ titthiyānaṃ maddanatthāya
analyzed: vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā ati vividham yamaka pāṭihāriyam titthiyānam maddana tthāya

original: akāsīti. Ettha ca pana yo koci evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ samattho ce. So āgacchatūti
analyzed: akāsi iti ettha ca pana yaḥ koci evarūpam pāṭihāriyam kātum samatthaḥ ce saḥ āgacchatu uti

original: codanāsadisattā vuttaṃ atthādānaparidīpananti. Atthādānañhi anuyogo, paṭipakkhassa
analyzed: codanā sadisa ttā vuttam attha ādāna paridīpanam ti attha ādānam hi anuyogaḥ paṭipakkhassa

original: atthassa ādānaṃ gahaṇanti katvā, tassa paridīpanaṃ atthādānaparidīpanaṃ. Titthiyamaddananti
analyzed: atthassa ādānam gahaṇanti katvā tassa paridīpanam attha ādāna paridīpanam titthiya maddanam ti

original: pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmāti kuhāyanavasena pubbe uṭṭhitānaṃ titthiyānaṃ maddanaṃ. Tañca
analyzed: pāṭihāriyam karissāma ati kuhāyana vasena pubbe uṭṭhitānam titthiyānam maddanam tat ca

original: tathā kātuṃ asamatthatā sampādanameva. Tadetaṃ padadvayaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyanti etena sambandhitabbanti.
analyzed: tathā kātum asamattha tā sampādanam eva tat etam pada dvayam yamaka pāṭihāriyanti etena sambandhitabbanti

original: Seṭṭhanti pasatthataraṃ. Tassa vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Paramaratijanti devamanussānaṃ
analyzed: seṭṭham ti pasatthataram tassa vacana attho heṭṭhā vuttaḥ yā eva parama rati janti deva manussānam

original: uttamaratiṃ janakaṃ. Paramānaṃ uttamasādhūnaṃ cittaramanaṃ janāpetaṃ vā, ettha ca
analyzed: uttama ratim janakam paramānam uttama sādhūnam citta ramanam jana apetam vā ettha ca

original: paṭhamavikappe paramasaddo uttamavācako anipphannapāṭipadiko nipāto. Dutiyavikappe
analyzed: paṭhama vikappe parama saddaḥ uttama vācakaḥ a nipphanna pāṭipadikaḥ nipātaḥ dutiya vikappe

original: sādhuvācako nipphannapāṭipadiko. Devamanussānaṃ paramaṃ uttamaṃ ratiṃ janetīti paramaratijo,
analyzed: sādhu vācakaḥ nipphanna pāṭipadikaḥ deva manussānam paramam uttamam ratim janeti iti parama rati jaḥ

original: munindo. Paramaratisaddūpapada janadhātu janane kvi. Atha vā pakārena saddhamme ramantīti
analyzed: jana dhātu janane atha vā pakārena saddhamme ramanti iti

original: paramā, sādhū labbhanti. Papubba ramudhātu kīḷāyaṃ a. Tesaṃ cittassa ratiṃ ramanaṃ
analyzed: paramā sādhū labbhanti a tesam cittassa ratim ramanaṃ

original: janetīti paramaratijo, munindo. Taṃ paramaratijaṃ. So hi dhamma desanāya ca pāṭihāriyena
analyzed: janeti iti parama rati jaḥ muni indo tam parama rati jam saḥ hi dhamma desanāya ca pāṭihāriyena

original: iddhiyā sarīrasobhagga sampattiādīhi ca devamanussānaṃ cittassa abhiratiṃ abhikkantaṃ
analyzed: iddhiyā sarīra sobhagga sampatti ādīhi ca deva manussānam cittassa abhiratim abhikkantam

original: janetīti paramaratijanti thometi.
analyzed: jana iti iti thoma iti

original: Iddhidhammehupetanti iddhidhammehi upetanti padacchedo. Iddhi dhammehīti acinteyyaappameyyehi
analyzed: iddhi dhammehi upetanti iddhi dhammehi upetanti padacchedaḥ iddhi dhammehi iti acinteyya appameyyehi

original: buddhaiddhisaṅkhātaguṇehi. Dhammasaddo hi guṇe vattati buddhadhammātiādīsu viya.

original: vuccati. Devo devānaṃ atireko atiuttamo atiseṭṭho ativisiṭṭho devo devādevātidevo,
analyzed: vuccati devaḥ devānam atirekaḥ ati uttamaḥ ati seṭṭhaḥ ati visiṭṭhaḥ devaḥ devādeva atidevaḥ

original: visuddhidevabhūto munindo labbhati. Taṃ devādevātidevaṃ.
analyzed: visuddhideva bhūtaḥ munindaḥ tam devādeva atidevam

original: Vuttañhi dhammahadayavibhaṅge “devāti tayo devā sammuti devā, upapattidevā, visuddhidevā.
analyzed: vuttam hi dhamma hadaya vibhaṅge devā ati tayaḥ devā sammuti devā upapatti devā visuddhi devā

original: Sammutidevā nāma rājāno deviyo rājakumārā. Upapattidevā nāma catumahārājike deve
analyzed: sammutidevāḥ nāma rājānaḥ deviyaḥ rāja kumārāḥ upapattidevāḥ nāma catu mahārājike deve

original: upādāya tadupari devā. Visuddhidevā nāma arahanto vuccantī”ti.
analyzed: upādāya tad upari devāḥ visuddhidevāḥ nāma arahantaḥ vuccanti iti

original: Bhagavā pana nirātisayāya abhiññākīḷāya uttamehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi saparasantānagatapañcavidhamāravija

analyzed: satta dhana ādi sammāpaṭipatti avecca ppasāda sakkāra dāna ggahaṇa saṅkhātena

original: dhammasabhāvapuggalajjhāsayānurūpānusāsanīsaṅkhātena ca vohārātisayena paramāya paññāsarīrappabhāsaṅkhātāya
analyzed: dhamma sabhāva puggala jjhāsaya anurūpa anusāsanī saṅkhātena ca vohāra atisayena paramāya paññā sarīra ppabhā saṅkhātāya

original: jutiyā anaññasādhāraṇāya ñāṇasarīragatiyā māravijaya sabbaññuguṇaparahita nipphādanesu

analyzed: a paṭihatāya sattiyā ca samannāgata ttā sa devakena lokena gamanīyataḥ abhitthavanīyataḥ

original: bhattivasena kamanīyato ca sabbe te deve tehi guṇehi abhibhuyya ṭhitattā tesaṃ devānaṃ

original: Nidhanavapudharanti antimakāyadhāraṇaṃ. Ettha ca nidhanasaddo pariyosānavācako anipphannapāṭipadiko.

original: Atha vā nidheti pariyosānaṃ karoti etenāti nidhanaṃ. Nidheti vināseti bhavanti vā

original: nidhanaṃ, antimakāyo labbhati. Nipubba dhā dhātu nāse yu. Vapati kusalākusalabījametthāti

original: vapu, kāyo. Vapadhātu bījasantāne u. Nidhanañca taṃ vapu cāti nidhanavapu, taṃ dhāretīti

analyzed: nibbattentānam sabba kilesānam bodhimaṇḍe agga magga ñāṇa satthena samucchindi

original: Mārabhaṅganti devaputtādipañcamāre viddhaṃsanaṃ. Mārasaddattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
analyzed: devaputta ādi pañca māre viddhaṃsanam māra saddatthaḥ heṭṭhā

original: Pañcamāre bhañjati abhañji bhañjissatīti mārabhaṅgo, munindo. Mārasaddūpapada bhanjadhātu
analyzed: bhañjati abhañji bhañjissati iti

original: avamaddane tapaccayo. Tassa saha dhātvantena goādeso. Nakārassa niggahitādeso. Tassa
analyzed: avamaddane ta paccayaḥ tassa saha dhātu antena go ādesaḥ nakārassa niggahita ādesaḥ tassa

original: kavaggantādeso. Taṃ mārabhaṅgaṃ. Abhaṅganti mārasenāya bhañjituṃ viddhaṃsituṃ asamatthaṃ,

original: bhañjiyate bhaṅgo. Nabhaṅgo abhaṅgo. Atha vā mārasenāya na bhañjiyatīti abhaṅgo.
analyzed: bhañjiyate bhaṅgaḥ na bhaṅgaḥ abhaṅgaḥ atha vā māra senāya na bhañjiyati iti abhaṅgo

original: Mārasenāya bhañjituṃ na arahatīti attho. Mārasenā bhañjituṃ na samatthoti vā abhaṅgo,
analyzed: māra senāya bhañjitum na arahati iti atthaḥ māra senā bhañjitum na samatthaḥ iti vā abhaṅgaḥ

original: munindo. Taṃ abhaṅgaṃ.
analyzed: munindo tam

original: Dīpaṃdīpaṃ pajānanti ettha pajānaṃ dīpaṃ dīpanti sambandho. Tattha pajānanti sattānaṃ.
analyzed: dīpam dīpam pajānanti ettha pajānam dīpam dīpanti sambandhaḥ tattha pajānanti sattānam

original: Tehi kammakilesehi pajāyanti nibbattiyanti, pakārena vā jāyanti nibbattanti paṭisandhicutivasenāti
analyzed: tehi kamma kilesehi pajāyanti nibbattiyanti pakārena vā jāyanti nibbattanti paṭisandhi cuti vasena ati

original: pajāti vuccanti. Dīpanti paññāpadīpaṃ. Tañhi kusalākusale dhamme vibhajitvā dīpeti
analyzed: pajā ti vuccanti dīpanti paññāpadīpam tat hi kusala akusale dhamme vibhajitvā dīpeti

original: pakāseti jotetīti dīpanti vuccati. Atha vā dippati jotetīti dīpo. Andhakāraṃ vidhametvā
analyzed: pakāseti joteti iti dīpanti vuccati atha vā dippati joteti iti dīpaḥ andhakāram vidhametvā

original: ālokaṃ pakāsetīti attho. Dīpadhātu dittiyaṃ a. Dīpamivāti dīpā, paññā. Yathā hi padīpo

original: andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ pakāseti, evaṃ paññā avijjandhakāraṃ hantvā dhammālokaṃ
analyzed: andhakāram vidhamitvā ālokam pakāseti evam paññā avijja andhakāram hantvā dhamma ālokam

original: pakāsetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ dīpaṃ. Puna dīpanti dīpakaṃ pakāsentanti attho. So hi
analyzed: pakāseti iti vuttam hoti tam dīpam puna dīpanti dīpakam pakāsentanti attho so hi

original: dīpeti pakāsetīti dīpoti vuccati. Munindo hi payirupāsanavasena gatāgatānaṃ vineyyasattānaṃ
analyzed: dīpeti pakāseti iti dīpo ti vuccati muni ndaḥ hi payiḥ upāsana vasena gata āgatānam vineyya sattānam

original: dhammadesanāya catumaggañāṇādipaññāpadīpaṃ pakāsetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ dīpaṃ.
analyzed: dhamma desanāya catu magga ñāṇa ādi paññā apadīpam pakāseti iti vuttam hoti tam dīpam

original: Jayavarasayaneti pañcamāravijayantaṭṭhānabhūte uttama bodhipallaṅkāsane. Pañcamāre
analyzed: jayavara sayana iti pañcamāra vijayanta ṭṭhāna bhūte uttama bodhi pallaṅka āsane pañcamāre

original: jināti etthāti jayo, bodhirukkhapallaṅko. Jidhātu jaye ṇa. Varitabbo patthi tabboti

original: varo, varadhātu patthane a. Varati nivāreti hīnanti vā varo. Varadhātu nivāraṇe a.

original: Buddhena seviyati bhajiyati etthāti sayano. Sidhātu sevāyaṃyu. Varo uttamo sayano
analyzed: buddhena seviyati bhajiyati etthā ati sayanaḥ sidhātu varaḥ uttamaḥ sayanaḥ

original: varasayano, jayoeva varasayano jayavarasayano, bodhirukkhapallaṅko. Tasmiṃ.
analyzed: vara sayanaḥ vara sayanaḥ jayavara sayanaḥ bodhi rukkha pallaṅko tasmin

original: Bodhipattaṃdhipattanti bodhipattaṃ adhipattanti padacchedo. Bodhipattanti arahattamaggasabbaññutañāṇaṃ
analyzed: bodhi pattam dhipattanti bodhi pattam adhipattanti padacchedaḥ bodhi pattanti arahatta magga sabbaññuta ñāṇam

original: gataṃ. Ettha ca bodhisaddo rukkhamaggañāṇasabbaññutañāṇanibbānesupi vattati. Tathā
analyzed: gatam ettha ca bodhi saddaḥ rukkha magga ñāṇa sabbaññu ta ñāṇa nibbānesu pi vattati tathā

original: hesa bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddhotiādīsu rukkhe vattati. Bodhi vuccati catūsu
analyzed: ha esa bodhi rukkha mūle paṭhama abhisambuddhaḥ ti ādīsu rukkhe vattati bodhi vuccati catūsu

original: maggesu ñāṇantiādīsu magge. Pappoti bodhiṃ varabhūrī medhasotiādīsu sabbaññutañāṇe.
analyzed: maggesu ñāṇa nti ādīsu magge pappoti bodhim vara bhūrī medhasā iti ādīsu sabbaññuta ñāṇe

original: Patvāna bodhiṃ amataṃ asaṅkhatantiādīsu nibbāne. Idha pana bhagavato arahattamaggasabbaññutañāṇaṃ
analyzed: bodhim amatam asaṅkhatam ti ādīsu nibbāne idha pana bhagavataḥ arahatta magga sabbaññuta ñāṇam

original: adhippetaṃ. Cattāri saccāni bujjhatīti bodhi, arahatta maggañāṇaṃ. Sabbañeyyadhamme
analyzed: adhippetam cattāri saccāni bujjhati iti bodhi arahatta magga ñāṇam sabba ñeyya dhamme

original: bujjhatīti bodhi, sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. Budhadhātu ñāṇe ṇa ī ca. Bodhi ca bodhi ca bodhi

original: sarūpekasesavasena. Taṃ apajjiṃ agaminti bodhi patto, munindo. Taṃ bodhipattaṃ. Adhipattanti
analyzed: sarūpa ikasesa vasena tam apajjim agaminti bodhi pattaḥ muni ndo tam bodhi pattam

original: sadevake loke sabbadevamanussānaṃ jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ gatanti attho. Sabbadevamanussānaṃ

original: adhikaṃ jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ vuḍḍhatarabhāvaṃ patto gatoti adhipatto, munindo. Taṃ adhipattaṃ.

analyzed: tam avijjaṇḍa kosam padāletvā paṭhamataram ariyāya jātiyā jāta ttā ca sīla samādhi paññā ādi

analyzed: seṭṭha bhāvam appaṭisama bhāvam ca pattaḥ gataḥ iti vuttam hoti tasmai

original: Brahmābrahmāgatānanti brahma abrahma āgatānanti padacchedo. Āgatānaṃ payirupāsanavasena
analyzed: brahma abrahma āgatānanti brahma abrahma āgatānanti padacchedaḥ āgatānanti payiḥ upāsana vasena

original: āgatānaṃ brahma devamanussaparisānanti attho. Tattha brahmāti brahmapārisajjādi brahmā.

original: Te hi jhānādiguṇehi brūhanti vaḍḍhantīti brahmāti vuccanti, abrahmāti devamanussā.

original: Te hi na brahmā abrahmāti vuccanti, āgacchanti payirupāsanavasenāti āgatā, brahmā

original: brahmāno labbhanti. Āpubbagamudhātu gatiyaṃ ta. Āgatā brahmā ca abrahmā cāti brahmābrahmāgatā,
analyzed: brahmānaḥ labbhanti gatiyam te āgatāḥ brahmā ca a brahmā ca ati brahmā a brahma āgatā

original: tesaṃ. Visesana paranipātapadametaṃ agyāhitotiādīsu viya. Taṃ pana padaṃ varagirakathikantipade
analyzed: tesam para nipāta padam etam tam pana padam vara gira kathi kanti pade

original: sampadānaṃ. Payirupāsanānaṃ brahma devamanussaparisānanti attho.

original: Varagirakathikanti uttamaṃ dhammavācaṃ desentaṃ. Seṭṭhavācāya dhammaṃ desamānaṃ vā,
analyzed: vara gira kathikam ti uttamam dhamma vācam desentam seṭṭha vācāya dhammam desamānam vā

original: gāyati kathiyatīti girā, vācā. Gādhātu sadde īro. Varā seṭṭhā girā vācā varagirā.
analyzed: gāyati kathiyati iti girā vācā sadde īraḥ varā seṭṭhā girā vācā varagirā

original: Tāya dhammaṃ kathetīti varagirakathiko, munindo. Uttamāya manāpabhūtavācāya dhammaṃ
analyzed: tāya dhammam katheti iti vara gira kathikaḥ muni ndo uttamāya manāpa bhūta vācāya dhammam

original: desetīti attho. Taṃ.
analyzed: deseti iti attho tam

original: Pāpahīnanti lāmakaakusalakilesaṃ. Tañhi apāyādi dukkhaṃ pāpetīti pāpoti vuccati.

original: Akusalakileso. Papubbaapadhātu pāpuṇane. Kusaladhammena hātabbaṃ caji tabbanti hīnanti
analyzed: akusala kilesaḥ pāpuṇane kusala dhammena hātabbam caji tabbanti hīnanti

original: Pahīnanti arahattamaggañāṇena susamucchinnaṃ. Pajahatīti pahīno, munindo. Papubbahādhātu
analyzed: pahīnam ti arahatta magga ñāṇena susamucchinnam pajahati iti pahīnaḥ munindaḥ

analyzed: sabbe akusala dhamme aggamagga ñāṇena samucchindati iti attho

original: Lokālokābhirāmanti lokaalokaabhirāmanti padacchedo. Manussalokadevabrahmalokānaṃ
analyzed: loka aloka abhirāmanti loka aloka abhirāmanti pada chedaḥ

original: Na loko aloko. Devabrahmaloko. Loko ca aloko ca lokālokā, tesaṃ sattalokānaṃ abhiadhikaṃ
analyzed: na lokaḥ alokaḥ deva brahma lokaḥ loko ca aloko ca lokālokā tesam satta lokānam abhiadhikam

analyzed: ramanti ettha ati lokāloka abhirāmaḥ tam saḥ hi pūjā anuggaha ādi karaṇa vasena

analyzed: abhirāma ṭṭhānam hoti iti thoma iti satatanti niccam ratti divam abhiṇhanti

original: attho. Munindanti pañcamunissaraṃ, taṃ munindaṃ. Abhinameti ahaṃ abhisakkaccaṃ namāmīti sambandhoti.
analyzed: atthaḥ munindanti pañca muni ssaram tam munindam abhinama iti aham abhisakkaccam namāmi iti sambandhaḥ uti

original: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Devādevātidevaṃ sammutidevaupapattidevānaṃ atiuttamaṃ
analyzed: ayam pana itthā saṅkhepa yojanā devādeva atidevam sammuti deva aupapatti devānam ati uttamam

analyzed: visuddhi deva bhūtam nidhana vapu dharam antima kāya dhāraṇam māra bhaṅgam deva putta ādi pañca māre

analyzed: pajānam sattānam dīpam paññā apadīpam kamma bhūtam dīpam dīpakam pakāsentam jaya vara sayane

original: Samakalapanajoti kakacena chinditvā ṭhapito viya samadantoti attho. Lapati vadati

analyzed: candamhi sasakam hatthena gaṇhitum vāyasānam khīram evam buddha bhāvaḥ atidullabhataraḥ ti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ pana hīnūpamāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ apadānapāḷiyaṃ –

original: “Udumbarikapupphaṃva, candamhi sasakaṃ yathā;

original: Dullabho buddhuppādo lokasmi”nti ca;
analyzed: dullabhaḥ buddhuppādaḥ lokasmin ti ca

analyzed: kā kathā buddha bhāvaḥ iti vuttaḥ vuttam api ca itam bhagavatā mahā parinibbāna samaye devatā

analyzed: otarentaḥ vā na mayam labhāma pacchime kāle tathāgatam dassanāya ati

original: Buddhabhāvoti buddhassa bhāvo. Kā kathāti kiṃ vattabboevāti attho. Kasmā pana buddho

analyzed: loke anekāḥ uppajjanti iti saccam etam buddhaḥ nāma pana aneka asaṅkhyeyya vārena vā aneka asaṅkhyeyya divasa māsa saṃvaccharam

original: “Buddhoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti;
analyzed: buddhā uti kittayantassa kāye bhavati yā pi iti

original: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassā”ti.
analyzed: varam eva hi sā kasiṇena api jambudīpassa ati

original: Tasmāti yasmā buddho buddhoti ghoso atidullabhataro, buddhabhāvo kā kathā. Tasmā.

original: Vibhāvīti medhāvī. Te hi hitāhitaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ vā visesena bhāveti pakāsetīti vibhāvā,

original: paññā. Vipubba bhūdhātu sattāyaṃ ṇa. Sā etesaṃ atthīti vibhāvīti vuccanti, sādhavo
analyzed: paññā bhūdhātu sattā ayam sā etesam atthi iti vibhāvī iti vuccanti sādhavaḥ

original: labbhati. Taṃ pana sādhavoti pade visesanaṃ.
analyzed: labbhati tam pana sādhavaḥ ti pade visesanam

original: Vividhahitasukhanti nānappakāraṃ lokiyalokuttara saṅkhātaṃ hitasukhaṃ. Tassa pana
analyzed: vividha hita sukhanti nānappakāram lokiya lokuttara saṅkhātam hita sukham tassa pana

original: attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Taṃ pana patthayantātipade kammaṃ. Sādhavoti sappurisā. Te
analyzed: atthaḥ heṭṭhā vuttaḥ yā iva tam pana patthayantā atipade kammam sādhavaḥ ti sappurisā te

original: hi saparahitaṃ sādheti nibbattetīti sādhavoti vuccati. Sādhadhātu saṃsiddhiyaṃ avo.
analyzed: hi sa para hitam sādheti nibbatteti iti sādhavaḥ ti vuccati

original: Tassa pana padassa namassantūti padena kattubhāvena sambandho. Patthayantāti yācantā.
analyzed: tassa pana padassa namassantu iti padena kattu bhāvena sambandhaḥ patthayantā ati yācantā

original: Vividhahitasukhaṃ patthayanti yācantīti patthayantā, sādhavo. Patthadhātu yācane
analyzed: vividha hita sukham patthayanti yācanti iti patthayantā sādhavaḥ yācane

original: anto. Yakārāgamo. Taṃ pana sādhavotipade visesanaṃ. Iṭṭhanti kāmayamānaṃ. Icchitabbaṃ

original: Atthanti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādiatthaṃ. Atthiyati patthiyatīti attho, vipākānisaṃsaphalaṃ.

original: Atthadhātu yācanāyaṃ a. Atha vā asati bhavati phalabhāvenāti attho. Asadhātu bhuvimhi
analyzed: atha vā asati bhavati phala bhāvena ati atthaḥ bhuvimhi

original: tha. Taṃ pana padadvayaṃ vahantantipade kammaṃ. Vahantanti dhārakaṃ. Vahati haratīti

analyzed: dhamma desanāya dhāreti iti attho

original: Suranaramahitanti devehi ca manussehi ca catupaccayādīhi pūjitaṃ. Idaṃ panettha nibbacanaṃ.

original: Issariyakīḷādīhi suranti dibbantīti surā, devā. Suradhātu dittiyaṃ. Atha vā suranti
analyzed: issariya kīḷa ādīhi suranti dibbanti iti surāḥ devā sura dhātu dittiyam atha vā

analyzed: devissariyam pāpuṇanti virocanti ca ati surāḥ devā sundarāḥ

analyzed: vā surā devā khandha santānam nenti iti narā manussā nara dhātu nayane a

original: Surā ca narā ca suranarā. Tehi mahitabbā pūjitabbāti suranaramahito, buddho. Mahadhātu
analyzed: surā ca narā ca sura narā tehi pūjitabbā ati sura nara mahitaḥ buddhaḥ maha dhātu

analyzed: gāthā vaṇṇanāyam vuttam eva
