analyzed: puññena itena saḥ ham nipuṇam ati sataḥ samparāye ca titto

original: Dakkho diṭṭhujjupañño avikalavīriyo bhogavā saṃvibhāgī;
analyzed: dakkhaḥ diṭṭhujju paññaḥ avikala vīriyaḥ bhogavā saṃvibhāgī

original: Tikkho sūro dhitatto saparahitadharo dīghajīvī arogo,
analyzed: tikkhaḥ sūraḥ dhitattaḥ sa para hita dharaḥ dīgha jīvī arogaḥ

original: Dhañño vaṇṇo yasassī atibalavadharo kittimā khantupeto.
analyzed: dhaññaḥ vaṇṇaḥ yasassī ati balava dharaḥ kittimā khantu peto

original: Saddho dātaṅgupeto paramasiridharo diṭṭhadhamme viratto,
analyzed: saddhaḥ dātaṅga upetaḥ parama siri dharo diṭṭha dhamme viratto

original: Lajjī kalyāṇamitto abhiratakusalo pañcasīlādirakkho;
analyzed: lajjī kalyāṇa mittaḥ abhirata kusalo pañca sīla ādi rakkho

original: Appiccho appakodho ativujuhadayo iddhimā appameyyo,
analyzed: appicchaḥ appa kodhaḥ ativujuhadayaḥ iddhimā appameyyaḥ

original: Pāsaṃso pemavāco sujanaguṇavidū māmako so bhaveyyaṃ.
analyzed: pāsaṃsaḥ su jana guṇa vidū māmakaḥ saḥ bhaveyyaṃ

original: 27. Evaṃ buddho buddhoti ghosotyādigāthāya buddhavandane uyyojanaṃ katvā idāni sugatantyādīhi
analyzed: evam buddhaḥ buddhaḥ iti ghosa ityādi gāthāya buddha vandane uyyojanam katvā idāni

original: gāthāhi buddhaṃ vanditvā paṇidhiṃ karonto āha puññenetena sohantyādi gāthādvayaṃ.
analyzed: gāthāhi buddham vanditvā paṇidhim karontaḥ āha puññena itena sohanti ādi gāthā dvayam

original: Ayaṃ pana gāthādvayampi saddharāgāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṃ soahaṃ
analyzed: ayam pana gāthā dvayam pi saddharā gāthā ti daṭṭhabbā tattha paṭhama gāthāyam

original: etena puññena samparāye nipuṇamati ca sato ca…pe… khantupeto ca bhaveyyanti sambandho.
analyzed: etena puññena samparāye ca cape ca sambandho

original: Sohanti so ahaṃ. Buddhassa namakkāro soahanti attho. Etena puññenāti iminā buddhavandanapuññakammena
analyzed: sohanti saḥ aham buddhassa namakkāro etena puññena ati iminā buddha vandana puñña kammena

original: attano kārakaṃ pavati sodhetīti puññaṃ. Pudhātu sodhane ṇya. Puññanti ca idha pana
analyzed: kārakam pavati sodheti iti puññam pudhātu sodhane ca idha pana

original: buddhapaṇāmakriyābhinipphādikā kusalacetanā adhippetā. Sā ca vandaneyyavandakānaṃ
analyzed: buddha paṇāma kriyā abhinipphādikā kusala cetanā adhippetā sā ca vandaneyya vandakānam

original: khettajjhāsayasampadāhi diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyabhūtā yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa
analyzed: diṭṭhadhamma vedanīya bhūtāḥ yathā laddha sampatti nimittakassa

original: kammassa anubalappadānavasena tannibbattitavipākasantatiyā antarāyakarāni upapīḷakaupacchedakakammāni
analyzed: kammassa anubala ppadāna vasena tad nibbattita vipāka santatiyāḥ antarāya karāni upapīḍaka upacchedaka kammāni

original: paṭibāhitvā tannidānānaṃ yathādhippetasiddhivibandhakānaṃ rogādiantarāyānamappavattiṃsādheti
analyzed: paṭibāhitvā yathā adhippeta siddhi vibandhakānam

original: cāti attho ca veditabbo. Samparāye cāti ettha casaddo aṭṭhānayogo. So ca nipuṇamatityādīsu
analyzed: ca ati attho ca veditabbo samparāye ca ati ettha ca saddo aṭṭhāna yogo saḥ ca nipuṇa mati tyādīsu

original: padesu yojetabbo. Samparāyeti paraloke. So hi samparāyitabbā upagamitabbā ettha sattehīti
analyzed: padesu yojetabbaḥ samparāyeti para loke saḥ hi samparāyitabbāḥ upagamitabbāḥ ettha sattehi iti

original: ca, kammakilesavasena sattehi samparāyitabbā pāpuṇitabbāti vā etthāti ca samparāyoti
analyzed: ca kamma kilesa vasena sattehi samparāyitabbā pāpuṇitabbā ati vā ettha ati ca samparāyo ti

original: vuccati. Saṃparipubba ayadhātu hi gatiyaṃ ṇa. Atha vā kammavasena abhimukho sampareti
analyzed: vuccati hi gatiyam atha vā kamma vasena abhimukhaḥ sampareti

original: gacchati pavattatīti samparāyoti vuccati. Saṃpubbaparadhātu gatiyaṃ ṇya. Iti kho
analyzed: gacchati pavattati iti samparāyaḥ iti vuccati saṃpubba para dhātu gatiyam iti kho

original: ānanda kusalāni sīlāni anupubbena aggāya parentītiādīsu viya hi curādi gaṇavasena
analyzed: ānanda kusalāni sīlāni anupubbena aggāya parenti itiādīsu viya hi curādi gaṇa vasena

original: parasaddaṃ gatiyamicchanti saddavidū. Tasmiṃ samparāye.
analyzed: para saddam gatiyam icchanti sadda vidū tasmin samparāye

original: Nipuṇamatīti saṇhasukhumapaññavā ca. Saṇhasukhumaṃ atthantaraṃ paṭivijjhanasamatthāya
analyzed: nipuṇa matī iti saṇha sukhuma paññavā ca saṇha sukhumam atthantaram paṭivijjhana samatthāya

original: paññāya sampanno ca vā. Ettha ca nipuṇasaddo saṇhasukhumavācako anipphannapāṭipadiko.
analyzed: paññāya sampannaḥ ca vā ettha ca nipuṇa saddo saṇha sukhuma vācakaḥ a nipphanna pāṭipadiko

original: Hitāhitaṃ manati jānātīti mati, paññā. Manadhātu ñāṇeti. Nipuṇā saṇhā mati paññā
analyzed: hita ahitam manati jānāti iti mati paññā mana dhātu ñāṇā iti nipuṇā saṇhā mati paññā

original: yassa meti nipuṇamati. Satoti satimā ca. Saratīti sati, saradhātu cintāyanti. Sā
analyzed: yassa mā iti nipuṇa mati satoti satimā ca sarati iti sati sara dhātu cintāyanti sā

original: assa me atthīti sato. Tittoti tappano ca. Yathāladdhavatthunā santuṭṭho cāti attho.
analyzed: assa me atthi iti sataḥ titto ti tappanaḥ ca yathā laddha vatthunā santuṭṭho ca ati attho

original: Tisanaṃ tappanaṃ titto. Tisadhātu tappane tapaccayo. Sakārassa toādeso. Yathālābha
analyzed: tisanam tappanam tittaḥ tisadhātu tappane tapaccayaḥ sakārassa to ādesaḥ yathālābha

original: santoso, yathābalasantoso, yathāsāruppasanto so cāti tividhena santosena santuṭṭhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: santosaḥ yathā bala santosaḥ yathā sāruppa santo so ca ati tividhena santosena santuṭṭhaḥ ti vuttam hoti

original: Dakkhoti taṃ taṃ kicce cheko ca kusalo ca vā. So hi kusalakamme aññasmiñca kiccākicce
analyzed: dakkho ti tam tam kicce cheko ca kusalo ca vā saḥ hi kusala kamme aññasmin ca kicca akicce

original: adandhatāya sīghaṃ gacchatīti dakkho. Dakkhadhātu sīghatthe a. Diṭṭhujjupaññoti diṭṭhiujupaññoti
analyzed: a dandha tāya sīgham gacchati iti dakkhaḥ dakkha dhātu sīgha atthe a diṭṭhi ujju pañño ti diṭṭhi uju pañño ti

original: padacchedo. Uju diṭṭhipaññāya samannāgatoti attho. Kesuci potthakesu diṭṭhijju paññoti
analyzed: padacchedaḥ uju diṭṭhi paññāya samannāgato ti attho kesuci potthakesu diṭṭhi jju pañño ti

original: pāṭho. Diṭṭhiujupaññoti padacchedo, soye vattho. Ujūti akuṭilabhāvena bhavatīti uju,
analyzed: pāṭhaḥ diṭṭhi uju pañño ti padacchedaḥ vattho uju iti akuṭila bhāvena bhavati iti uju

original: ajjavo. Ujudhātu ajjave kvi. Atha vā arati akuṭilabhāvena pavattatīti uju, avaṅko.
analyzed: ajjavaḥ ujudhātu ajjave kvi atha vā arati akuṭila bhāvena pavattati iti uju avaṅkaḥ

original: Aradhātu gatiyaṃ jupaccayo. Arissa uādeso. Sammā passatīti diṭṭhi, mati. Disadhātu
analyzed: ara dhātu gatiyam ju paccayaḥ arissa u ādesaḥ sammā passati iti diṭṭhi mati disa dhātu

original: passane tapaccayo. Tassa raṭṭhādeso. Dhātvantalopo ca ī ca. Uju ajjavā diṭṭhi mati
analyzed: passane ta paccayaḥ tassa ra ṭṭha ādesaḥ dhātu anta lopaḥ ca ī ca uju ajjavā diṭṭhi mati

original: diṭṭhuju visesanaparanipātavasena. Pakārena jānāti aniccādivasena avabujjhatīti paññā.
analyzed: visesana para nipāta vasena pakārena jānāti anicca ādi vasena avabujjhati iti paññā

original: Papubbañādhātu avabodhane a. Ujudiṭṭhi ca ujupaññā ca yassa meti diṭṭhujjupañño,
analyzed: pa pubbañā dhātu avabodhane a uju diṭṭhi ca uju paññā ca yassa mā iti diṭṭha ujju pañño

original: puggalo. Avikalavīriyoti anūnavīriyo ca paripuṇṇavīriyo cāti attho. Vihīnaṃ karotīti
analyzed: puggalaḥ avikala vīriyo ti anūna vīriyo ca paripuṇṇa vīriyo ca ati attho vihīnam karoti iti

original: vikalo. Vipubbakaradhātu karaṇe a. Rassalo. Vīrānaṃ kammaṃ vīriyaṃ. Avikalaṃ anūnaṃ
analyzed: vikalaḥ vipubba kara dhātu karaṇe a rassalaḥ vīrānam kammam vīriyam a vikalam anūnam

original: vīriyaṃ assameti avikalavīriyo. Na sakkā kusīteneva navalokuttaradhammā laddhuṃ,
analyzed: vīriyam assameti avikala vīriyaḥ na sakkā kusītena iva nava lokuttara dhammāḥ laddhum

original: āraddhavīriyeneva sakkā. Tasmā avikalavīriyoti patthetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: āraddha vīriyena iva sakkā tasmai avikala vīriyaḥ ti pattheti iti vuttam hoti

original: Bhogavāti bhuñjitabbasampattisukhena sampanno ca. Bhuñjitabboti bhogo, sampatti.
analyzed: bhogavā ati bhuñjitabba sampatti sukhena sampannaḥ ca bhuñjitabbaḥ iti bhogaḥ sampatti

original: Bhujadhātu pālanabyavaharaṇesu ṇa. Bhogo assa me atthīti bhogavā. Saṃvibhāgīti saṃvibhajanasīlo
analyzed: bhuja dhātu pālana byavaharaṇesu na bhogaḥ assa me atthi iti bhogavā saṃvibhāgī iti saṃvibhajana sīlaḥ

original: ca saṃvibhajanasampanno ca vā, saṃvibhajati sīlenāti saṃvibhāgī. Saṃvibhajanasīloti
analyzed: ca saṃvibhajana sampannaḥ ca vā saṃvibhajati sīlena ati saṃvibhāgī saṃvibhajana sīlaḥ uti

original: vā saṃvibhāgī, saṃvibhajituṃ sīlamassāti vā saṃvibhāgī. Saṃvibhāge sīlamassāti saṃvibhāgī.
analyzed: vā saṃvibhāgī saṃvibhajitum sīlam assa ati vā saṃvibhāgī saṃvibhāge sīlam assa ati saṃvibhāgī

original: Ayaṃ tassīlattho. Saṃvibhajati dhammenāti saṃvibhajanadhammoti vā. Saṃvibhajituṃ
analyzed: ayam saṃvibhajati dhammena ati saṃvibhajana dhammaḥ iti vā saṃvibhajitum

original: dhammo assāti vā, saṃvibhajane dhammo assāti vā saṃvibhāgī. Ayaṃ taddhammattho. Saṃvibhajanaṃ
analyzed: dhammaḥ assa ati vā saṃvibhajane dhammaḥ assa ati vā saṃvibhāgī ayam tad dhamma atthaḥ saṃvibhajanam

original: sādhukāro assa atthi. Sādhukārinā saṃvibhajatīti vā, saṃvibhajituṃ sādhukārīti vā,
analyzed: sādhukāraḥ assa atthi sādhukārinā saṃvibhajati iti vā saṃvibhajitum sādhukārī iti vā

original: saṃvibhajane sādhukārīti vā saṃvibhāgī. Ayaṃ tassā dhukārattho. Saṃvipubba bhajadhātu
analyzed: saṃvibhajane sādhukārī iti vā saṃvibhāgī ayam bhaja dhātu

original: vibhāge ṇa. Jassa go. Atha vā saṃvibhajanaṃ saṃvibhāgo. So me assa atthīti saṃvibhāgī.
analyzed: vibhāge ṇa jassa gaḥ atha vā saṃvibhajanam saṃvibhāgaḥ saḥ me assa atthi iti saṃvibhāgī

original: Assathyatthe ī. Paresaṃ yācakānaṃ annādidānavatthuṃ niccaṃ pariccajanakārīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: assathī atthe ī paresam yācakānam anna ādi dāna vatthum niccam pariccajana kāri iti vuttam hoti

original: Tikkhoti tikkhappaññavā ca nisānapaññavā vā. Tijanaṃ nisanaṃ tikkhā, paññā. Tijadhātu
analyzed: tikkhaḥ ti tikkhappaññavā ca nisāna paññavā vā tijanam nisanam tikkhā paññā tijadhātu

original: nisāne kha. Jassa ko. Tikkhā paññā me assa atthīti tikkho. Assathyatthe ṇo. Tikkha
analyzed: nisāne kha jassa kaḥ tikkhā paññā me assa atthi iti tikkhaḥ assathi atthe ṇo tikkha

original: paññāya sampanno cāti attho. Paññāya ca sabba kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ seṭṭhattā mūlakāraṇattā
analyzed: paññāya sampanno ca ati attho paññāya ca sabba kusalānam dhammānam seṭṭha ttā mūla kāraṇa ttā

original: ca tikkhoti patthanaṃ karoti. Vuttañhi milindapañhe –
analyzed: ca tikkho ti patthanam karoti vuttam hi milindapañhe

original: “Paññā pasaṭṭhā lokasmiṃ, katā saddhammaṭṭhitiyā;
analyzed: paññā pasaṭṭhā lokasmiṃ katā saddhamma ṭṭhitiyā

original: Paññāya vimatiṃ hantvā, santiṃ pappoti paṇḍito”ti.
analyzed: paññāya vimatim hantvā santim pappoti paṇḍito ti

original: Sūroti catūsu parisāsu aṭṭhasu parisāsu ca vīro ca. Sattivanto nibbhayoti attho.
analyzed: catūsu parisāsu aṭṭhasu parisāsu ca vīro ca sattivantaḥ nibbhayo ti attho

original: Sūrayate virayate sūro. Bhāvasādhanoyaṃ. Sūradhātu vikkantiyaṃ vīre vā a. Atha vā
analyzed: sūrayate virayate sūraḥ bhāva sādhanoyam sūra dhātu vikkantiyam vīre vā a atha vā

original: abhiruachambhianutrāsabhāvena sūrati gacchati pavattatīti sūro. Sūradhātu gatiyaṃ
analyzed: abhirua chambhi anutrāsa bhāvena sūrati gacchati pavattati iti sūraḥ sūra dhātu

original: a. Sīho viya parisamajjhe sūravīrasampanno cāti attho. Sāsani kehi pana saddhammavidūhi
analyzed: a sīhaḥ viya parisamajjhe sūra vīra sampanno ca ati attho sāsani kehi pana saddhamma vidūhi

original: sūrasaddassa nibbacanaṃ na dassitaṃ. Kevalaṃ pana sūroti visiṭṭhasūroti atthavivaraṇamattameva
analyzed: sūra saddassa nibbacanam na dassitam kevalam pana sūra uti visiṭṭha sūra uti attha vivaraṇa mattam eva

original: dassitaṃ. Dhitattoti ettha dhita attoti padacchedo. Dhitoti samādhi. Attanti cittaṃ.
analyzed: dassitam ettha dhita attoti padacchedaḥ dhita uti samādhi attanti cittam

original: Ekaggacittasampanno cāti attho. Dhāti tiṭṭhati ekārammaṇehi dhito, ekārammaṇe sampayuttadhamme
analyzed: ekagga citta sampannaḥ ca ati atthaḥ tiṭṭhati eka ārammaṇehi eka ārammaṇe sampayutta dhamme

original: dhāretīti vā dhito, samādhi. Dhādhātu dhāraṇe ta. Ārammaṇaṃ arati jānātīti attaṃ,
analyzed: dhārā iti iti vā samādhi dhādhātu dhāraṇe te ārammaṇam arati jānāti iti attam

original: cittaṃ. Aradhātu gatiyaṃ ta. Rassa to. Dhito samādhi attaṃ cittaṃ assa meti dhitatto.
analyzed: cittam aradhātu gatiyam ta rassa taḥ dhitaḥ samādhi attam cittam assa mā iti

original: Saparahitacaroti attahitaparahitacaro, attano ca parassa ca atthaṃ paṭipannako cāti
analyzed: sa para hita caro ti atta hita para hita caro attanaḥ ca parassa ca attham paṭipannako ca ati

original: attho. Attano ca parassa ca hitaṃ atthaṃ payojanaṃ carati paṭipajjatīti saparahitacaro.
analyzed: atthaḥ attanaḥ ca parassa ca hitam attham payojanam carati paṭipajjati iti sa para hita caraḥ

original: Saparahitasaddūpapada caradhātu caraṇe a. Dīghajīvīti dīghāyuko ca. Dīghena jīvitindriyena
analyzed: cara dhātu caraṇe ca dīghena jīvita indriyena

original: sampanno vā. Dīgho jīvo jīvitaṃ assa meti dīghajīvi. Āyukappampi dīghajīvitasampanno
analyzed: sampannaḥ vā dīghaḥ jīvaḥ jīvitam assa me iti dīgha jīvi āyu kappam pi dīgha jīvita sampannaḥ

original: cāti attho. Arogoti rogaviraho ca ārogyaṃ vā. Rujjati bhañjati aṅgapaccaṅgānīti rogo,
analyzed: ca ati attho arogo ti roga viraho ca ārogyam vā rujjati bhañjati aṅga paccaṅgāni iti rogo

original: byādhi. Rujadhātu bhaṅge ṇa. Atha vā rujjati hiṃsatīti rogo. Rujadhātu hiṃsāyaṃ ṇa.
analyzed: atha vā rujjati hiṃsati iti rogaḥ

original: Natthi rogo tassa meti arogo, channavutirogānaṃ abhāvo bhaveyyanti attho. Dhaññoti
analyzed: natthi rogo tassa mā iti arogaḥ channavuti rogānam abhāvaḥ bhaveyyanti atthaḥ dhañño ti

original: sirīpuññapaññālakkhaṇasampanno ca. Dhaññasaddo hi sirīpuññapaññālakkhaṇavācakoti
analyzed: sirī puñña paññā lakkhaṇa sampannaḥ ca dhañña saddaḥ hi sirī puñña paññā lakkhaṇa vācakaḥ ti

original: daṭṭhabbo. Vuttañhi vessantarajātake “dhaññaṃ maṅgala sammata”nti ca. Temiyajātake
analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ vuttam hi vessantara jātake dhaññam maṅgala sammatan ti ca temiya jātake

original: “dhaññapuññalakkhaṇasampannaṃ puttaṃ vijāyī”ti ca. Idaṃ pana nibbacanaṃ. Dhananaṃ
analyzed: dhañña puñña lakkhaṇa sampannam puttam vijāyī iti ca idam pana nibbacanam dhananam

original: sampajjanaṃ dhaññaṃ, sirīpaññāpuññalakkhaṇānaṃ sampannanti attho. Dhanadhātu sampanne.
analyzed: sampajjanam dhaññam sirī paññā puñña lakkhaṇānam sampannanti atthaḥ dhana dhātu sampanne

original: Dhātūnaṃ anekatthattā ṇyapaccayo. Ṇakārānubandhe lope kate yapaccayena saddhiṃ nakārassa
analyzed: dhātūnam anekattha ttā ṇi a paccayaḥ ṇakāra anubandhe lope kate ya paccayena saddhim nakārassa

original: ñakāraṃ katvā dhaññanti rūpasiddhi veditabbā. Atha vā dhanaṃ sirīpaññā puññalakkhaṇasampadaṃ
analyzed: ñakāram katvā veditabbā atha vā dhanam sirī paññā puñña lakkhaṇa sampadam

original: assa me atthīti dhañño. Assathyatthe ṇyo.
analyzed: assa me atthi iti dhaññaḥ assathi atthe ṇyaḥ

original: Vaṇṇoti vaṇṇasampanno ca. Ettha ca vaṇṇo duvidho hoti sarīravaṇṇaguṇavaṇṇavasena.
analyzed: vaṇṇoti vaṇṇa sampanno ca ettha ca vaṇṇaḥ duvidhaḥ hoti sarīra vaṇṇa guṇa vaṇṇa vasena

original: Tattha sarīra vaṇṇo nāma rūpakāyassa pāsādikarūpasampannatā. Guṇa vaṇṇo nāma sīlasamādhipaññādiguṇena
analyzed: tattha sarīra vaṇṇaḥ nāma rūpa kāyassa pāsādika rūpa sampanna tā guṇa vaṇṇaḥ nāma sīla samādhi paññā ādi guṇena

original: ca dhutaṅgādipaṭipadāguṇena ca sampannatā. Idaṃ pana nibbacanaṃ. Vaṇṇeti vikāramāpannānaṃ
analyzed: ca dhutaṅga ādi paṭipadā guṇena ca sampanna tā idam pana nibbacanam vaṇṇā iti vikāram āpannānam

original: hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti vaṇṇo, sarīrarūpaṃ. Vaṇṇeti attano dabbaṃ pakāsetīti

original: ramanaṃ abhirato, kusalesu abhirato yassa meti abhiratakusalo, niccaṃ kusalapuññassa
analyzed: ramanam abhirataḥ kusalesu abhirataḥ yassa mā iti abhirata kusalaḥ niccam kusala puññassa

original: karaṇe abhiratacittasampanno cāti attho.
analyzed: karaṇe abhirata citta sampannaḥ ca ati attho

original: Pañcasīlādirakkhoti pañcasīlādīnaṃ rakkhituṃ samattho ca. Ettha ca ādisaddena gihīnaṃ
analyzed: pañca sīla ādi rakkhaḥ ti pañca sīla ādīnam rakkhitum samatthaḥ ca ettha ca ādi saddena gihīnam

original: aṭṭhaṅguposathasīlaṃ, sāmaṇerānaṃ dasaṅgasīlañca, bhikkhūnaṃ catupārisuddhisīlañca
analyzed: aṭṭhaṅgu posatha sīlam sāmaṇerānam dasaṅga sīlam ca bhikkhūnam catu pārisuddhi sīlam ca

original: saṅgaṇhāti. Pañcasīlaṃ ādi yesaṃ teti pañcasīlādi, taṃ rakkhati rakkhituṃ samatthetīti
analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti pañcasīlam ādi yesam te iti pañcasīla ādi tam rakkhati rakkhitum samattheti iti

original: pañcasīlādirakkho. Gahaṭṭhānaṃ niccasīlavasena pañcasīlaṃ sati ussāhasamatthe uposathaṅgavasena
analyzed: pañca sīla ādi rakkhaḥ gaha ṭṭhānam nicca sīla vasena pañca sīlam sati ussāha samatthe uposatha aṅga vasena

original: aṭṭhaṅgasīlaṃ dasaṅgasīlañca akhaṇḍaṃ acchiddaṃ asabalaṃ akammāsaṃ katvā rakkhituṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhaṅga sīlam dasaṅga sīlam ca akhaṇḍam acchiddam a sabalam a kammāsam katvā rakkhitum

original: sāmaṇerasīlavasena dasasīlañca, bhikkhusīlavasena catupārisuddhisīlañca rakkhituṃ
analyzed: sāmaṇera sīla vasena dasa sīlam ca bhikkhu sīla vasena catu pārisuddhi sīlam ca rakkhitum

original: samattho cāti attho. Bhagavatā hi “sīlavipattihetu vā bhikkhave sattā kāyassa bhedā
analyzed: samatthaḥ ca ati atthaḥ bhagavatā hi sīla vipatti hetu vā bhikkhave sattā kāyassa bhedā

original: paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti ca. “Sīlasampadāhetu
analyzed: param maraṇāḥ apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjanti iti ca sīla sampadā hetu

original: vā bhikkhave sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti
analyzed: vā bhikkhave sattā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti iti

original: ca. “Sīlasampanno mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchati kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
analyzed: ca sīla sampannaḥ mahantam bhogakkhandham adhigacchati kalyāṇaḥ kitti saddaḥ abbhut gacchati

original: Catuparisaṃ visārado upasaṅkamati amaṅkubhūto. Asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā
analyzed: catu parisam visāradaḥ upasaṅkamati a maṅku bhūtaḥ a sammūḍhaḥ kālam karoti kāyassa bhedā

original: paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatī”ti ca vuttattā ca. Aṭṭhakathāyañca “sīlālaṅkārasadiso
analyzed: param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati iti ca vutta ttā ca aṭṭhakathāyan ca sīla alaṅkāra sadisaḥ

original: alaṅkāro natthi, sīlasadisaṃ pupphaṃ natthi, sīlagandhasadiso gandho natthī”ti ca.
analyzed: alaṅkāraḥ natthi sīla sadisam puppham natthi sīla gandha sadisaḥ gandhaḥ natthi iti ca

original: “Sīla sampattiñhi nissāya tisso vijjā pāpuṇātī”ti ca. “Ādimhi sīlaṃ visodheyyā”ti
analyzed: sīla sampattiñhi nissāya tissaḥ vijjā pāpuṇāti iti ca ādimhi sīlam visodheyya ati

original: ca. “Sattā sīlena visujjhantī”ti ca. “Sīlaṃ sāsanassa ādī”ti ca. “Sattasu visuddhīsu
analyzed: ca sattā sīlena visujjhanti iti ca sīlam sāsanassa ādi iti ca sattasu visuddhīsu

original: sīlavisuddhi sarīraṃ nāmā”ti ca. “Sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ
analyzed: sīla visuddhi sarīram nāma ati ca sīlam nāma etam avassayaḥ patiṭṭhā ārammaṇam tāṇam

original: leṇaṃ gati parāyana”nti ca vuttattā pañcasīlādirakkhoti patthanaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ca vutta ttā pañca sīla ādi rakkhā hoti patthanam karoti iti vuttam hoti

original: Appicchoti aniccho ca, rūpādikāmaguṇesu anicchantoti attho. Abhāvatthohettha appasaddo.
analyzed: appiccho ti anicchaḥ ca rūpa ādi kāmaguṇesu an icchanto ti atthaḥ abhāva tthaḥ u ha ittha appasaddo

original: Appaḍaṃsamakasavā tātapātiādīsu viya icchanaṃ icchā, rūpādikāmaguṇaṃ icchatīti vā
analyzed: tātapāti ādīsu viya icchanam icchā rūpa ādi kāma guṇam icchati iti vā

original: icchā, kāmataṇhā. Isudhātu icchākantīsu a. Dhātvantassaccho. Natthi icchā yassa meti
analyzed: icchā kāmataṇhā isudhātu icchākantīsu na atthi icchā yassa mā iti

original: appiccho, rūpādīsu kāmesu anicchanto cāti attho. Appiccho pana catubbidho hoti paccayaappiccho,
analyzed: appicchaḥ rūpa ādīsu kāmesu an icchanto ca ati atthaḥ appicchaḥ pana catubbidhaḥ hoti paccaya appiccho

original: pariyattiappiccho, dhutaṅgaappiccho, paṭivedhaappiccho cāti. Tattha catūsu paccayesu
analyzed: pariyatti appicchaḥ dhutaṅga appicchaḥ paṭivedha appicchaḥ ca ati tattha catūsu paccayesu

original: appiccho paccayaappiccho. Yo pana paccaye bahuṃ dente appaṃ gaṇhati, appaṃ dente
analyzed: appicchaḥ paccaya appicchaḥ yaḥ pana paccaye bahum dente appam gaṇhati appam dente

original: appataraṃ vā gaṇhati na vā gaṇhati. Na anavasesagāhī hoti. Ayaṃ paccayaappiccho nāma.
analyzed: appataram vā gaṇhati na vā gaṇhati na anavasesa gāhī hoti ayam paccayaappicchaḥ nāma

original: Yo pana tepiṭakopi samāno na bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetukāmo hoti, ayaṃ pariyattiappiccho
analyzed: yaḥ pana tepiṭakaḥ api samānaḥ na bahu ssuta bhāvam jāna apetu kāmaḥ hoti ayam pariyatti appicchaḥ

original: nāma. Dhutaṅgasamādānassa pana dhutaṅgapariharaṇabhāvaṃ aññesaṃ jānituṃ na deti,
analyzed: nāma dhutaṅga samādānassa pana dhutaṅga pariharaṇa bhāvam aññesam jānitum na deti

original: ayaṃ dhutaṅgaappiccho nāma. Yo pana sotāpannādīsu aññataro hutvā sotāpannādibhāvaṃ
analyzed: ayam dhutaṅgaappiccho nāma yo pana sotāpanna ādīsu aññataraḥ hutvā sotāpanna ādi bhāvam

original: jānāpetuṃ na icchati, ayaṃ adhigamaappiccho nāma. Imehi appicchaguṇehi sampanno ca
analyzed: naḥ icchati ayam adhigama appicchaḥ nāma imehi appiccha guṇehi sampannaḥ ca

original: ahaṃ bhaveyyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: aham bhaveyyanti vuttam hoti

original: Appakodhoti dussanalakkhaṇadosato virahito ca. So hi kujjhatīti kodhoti vuccati. Dosassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Natthi kodho assa meti appakodho.
analyzed: appa kodho ti dussana lakkhaṇa dosataḥ virahito ca so hi kujjhati iti kodho iti vuccati dosassa etam adhivacanam natthi kodho assa me iti appa kodho

original: Kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passati;
analyzed: kuddhaḥ attham na jānāti kuddhaḥ dhammam na passati

original: Andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ kodho sahate naranti.
analyzed: andhatamam tadā hoti yam kodho sahate

original: Vuttadesanaṃ manasikaritvā appakodhoti patthanaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: vutta desanam manasikaritvā appa kodho ti patthanam karoti iti vuttam hoti

original: Ativujuhadayoti atieva ujucittasamannāgato ca. Arati gacchati pavattati akuṭilabhāvenāti
analyzed: ati eva uju citta samannāgato ca arati gacchati pavattati akuṭila bhāvena ati

original: uju, ajjavaṃ. Aradhātu gatiyaṃ ju. Arissa u. Ārammaṇaṃ haratīti hadayaṃ, cittaṃ.
analyzed: uju aradhātu gatiyam arissa u ārammaṇam harati iti hadayam cittam

original: Haradhātu haraṇe aya. Rassa do. Atha vā ārammaṇaṃ harantaṃ ayati gacchati pavattatīti
analyzed: haradhātu haraṇe aya rassa daḥ atha vā ārammaṇam harantam ayati gacchati pavattati iti

original: hadayaṃ, cittaṃ. Harasaddūpapada ayadhātu gatiyaṃ a. Uju ca taṃ hadayañcāti ujuhadayaṃ.
analyzed: hadayam cittam uju ca tam hadayam ca ati ujuhadayam

original: Atieva uju hadayaṃ assa meti ativujuhadayo. Gomuttavaṅko ca candalekhāvaṅko ca naṅgalakoṭi
analyzed: uju hadayam assa mā iti gomutta vaṅko ca candalekhā vaṅko ca naṅgala koṭi

original: vaṅko cāti tīhi vaṅkehi vigato hutvā ativiya ujucittasamannāgato ca bhaveyyanti attho.
analyzed: vaṅko ca ati tīhi vaṅkehi vigataḥ hutvā ativiya uju citta samannāgato ca bhaveyyanti attho

original: Tattha ca yo pāpaṃ katvāva na karomīti bhāsati. So gantvā paccosakkanatāya gomuttavaṅko
analyzed: tattha ca yaḥ pāpam katvā ava na karomi iti bhāsati saḥ gantvā gomutta vaṅkaḥ

original: nāma. Yo pāpaṃ karontova bhāyāmahaṃ pāpassāti bhāsati. So yebhuyyena kuṭilatāya candalekhā
analyzed: nāma yaḥ pāpam karontaḥ uva bhāyāmaham pāpassa ati bhāsati saḥ yebhuyyena kuṭila tāya candalekhā

original: vaṅko nāma. Yo pāpaṃ karontova ko pāpassa na bhāyeyyāti bhāsati, so nātikuṭilatāya
analyzed: vaṅkaḥ nāma yaḥ pāpam karontaḥ uva kaḥ pāpassa na bhāyeyya ati bhāsati so na ati kuṭila tāya

original: naṅgalakoṭivaṅko nāma hoti. Yassa vā tīṇi kammadvārāni asuddhāni. So gomuttavaṅko
analyzed: naṅgalakoṭivaṅkaḥ nāma hoti yassa vā tīṇi kammadvārāni asuddhāni so gomuttavaṅko

original: nāma hoti. Yassa yāni kānici dve. So candalekhā vaṅko nāma. Yassa yaṃkiñci ekaṃ.
analyzed: nāma hoti yassa yāni kānici dve so candalekhā vaṅkaḥ nāma yassa yaṃkiñci ekam

original: So naṅgalakoṭivaṅko nāmāti veditabbo.
analyzed: saḥ naṅgalakoṭivaṅkaḥ nāma ati veditabbo

original: Iddhimāti iddhiyā samannāgato ca, iddhisaddassa vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Iddhi
analyzed: iddhimā ti iddhiyā samannāgataḥ ca iddhi saddassa vacana attho heṭṭhā vuttaḥ yeva iddhi

original: assa me atthīti iddhimā. Assathyatthe mantupaccayo. Mānussikāle manussiddhiyā devuppattikāle
analyzed: assa me atthi iti iddhimā assathī atthe mantu paccayaḥ mānussi kāle manussiddhiyā deva uppatti kāle

original: deviddhiyā samaṇuppattikāle samaṇiddhiyā ca sampuṇṇeyyanti attho.
analyzed: deva iddhiyā samaṇa uppatti kāle samaṇa iddhiyā ca attho

original: Appameyyoti appametabbehi sīlādiguṇehi sampanno ca. Pametabboti pameyyo. Papubbamādhātu
analyzed: appameyyaḥ ti a pametabbehi sīla ādi guṇehi sampannaḥ ca pametabbaḥ iti pameyyaḥ papubbam ādhātu

original: pamāṇe ṇya. Na pameyyo appameyyo, appameyyo sīlādiguṇo me assa atthīti appameyyo.
analyzed: pamāṇe na pameyyaḥ appameyyaḥ appameyyaḥ sīla ādi guṇaḥ me assa atthi iti appameyyaḥ

original: Assathyatthe ṇa. Appameyyehi sīlādiguṇehi ca bhogasampattīhi ca sampajjāmīti patthanaṃ
analyzed: assathi atthe na appameyyehi sīla ādi guṇehi ca bhoga sampattīhi ca sampajjāmi iti patthanam

original: karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: karoti iti vuttam hoti

original: Pāsaṃsoti sīlādiguṇehi buddhādisappurisānaṃ pasaṃsāraho ca, pasaṃsiyate thaviyate
analyzed: sīla ādi guṇehi buddha ādi sappurisānam ca pasaṃsiyate

original: pasaṃso. Bhāva sādhanoyaṃ. Papubbasaṃsadhātu thutiyaṃ, taṃ arahatīti pāsaṃso. Arahatitaddhite
analyzed: pasaṃsaḥ bhāva sādhanoyam tam arahati iti pāsaṃsaḥ arahati taddhite

original: ṇa. Buddhādisappurisehi pasaṃsi tabbehi dānasīlādiguṇehi sampanno ca bhaveyyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: buddha ādi sappurisehi dāna sīla ādi guṇehi sampannaḥ ca bhaveyyanti vuttam hoti

original: Pemavācoti atthabyañjanamadhuratāya buddhādisappurisehi pemitabbavācāya sampanno
analyzed: pema vācaḥ ti attha byañjana madhura tāya buddha ādi sappurisehi pemitabba vācāya sampannaḥ

original: ca. Piyateti pemā, vācā. Pīdhātu tappanakantīsu imo. Vacitabbāti vācā. Vacadhātu
analyzed: ca vācā pīdhātu tappana kantīsu vacitabbā ati vācā

original: viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ ṇa. Pemā vācā assa meti pema vāco. Buddhādisappurisehi pemiyā
analyzed: viyattiyam vācāyam na pemā vācāḥ assa mā iti pemā vācaḥ buddha ādi sappurisehi

original: caturaṅgasamannāgata vācāya sampanno cāti attho. Sappurisānaṃ pana vācā caturaṅgasamannāgatā
analyzed: vācāya sampanno ca ati attho sappurisānam pana vācā caturaṅga samannāgatā

original: hoti. Subhāsitavācā ca dhammavācā piyavācā saccavācāti. Tathāhetaṃ vuttaṃ sagāthāvagga saṃyutte –
analyzed: hoti su bhāsita vācā ca dhamma vācā piya vācā sacca vācā ti tathā ha etam vuttam sagāthā vagga saṃyutte

original: Subhāsitaṃ uttamamāhu santo,
analyzed: su bhāsitam uttamam āhu santaḥ

original: Dhammaṃ bhaṇe nādhammaṃ taṃ dutiyaṃ;
analyzed: dhammam bhaṇe na adhammam tam dutiyam

original: Piyaṃ bhaṇe nāppiyaṃ taṃ tatiyaṃ,
analyzed: piyam bhaṇe na appiyam tam tatiyam

original: Saccaṃ bhaṇe nālikaṃ taṃ catutthanti.
analyzed: saccam bhaṇe nālikam tam catuttham ti

original: Ayaṃ panettha yojanā. Santo sappurisā uttamaṃ subhāsitaṃ suṭṭhu bhāsitaṃ vācaṃ āhu,
analyzed: ayam pana ittha yojanā santo sappurisāḥ uttamam su bhāsitam suṭṭhu bhāsitam vācam āhu

original: dhammaṃ bhaṇe bhaṇeyya adhammaṃ na bhaṇe na bhaṇeyya, dutiyaṃ taṃ vācaṃ āhu, piyaṃ
analyzed: dhammam bhaṇe bhaṇeyya adhammam na bhaṇe na bhaṇeyya dutiyam tam vācam āhu piyam

original: bhaṇe bhaṇeyya, appiyaṃ na bhaṇe na bhaṇeyya, tatiyaṃ taṃ vācaṃ āhu, saccaṃ bhaṇe

original: bhaṇeyya alikaṃ na bhaṇe na bhaṇeyya, catutthaṃ taṃ vācaṃ āhūti.
analyzed: bhaṇeyya alikam na bhaṇe na bhaṇeyya catuttham tam vācam

original: Sujanaguṇavidūti buddhādisappurisānaṃ sīlādiguṇaṃ vijānako ca. Sundaro jano sujano.
analyzed: buddha ādi sappurisānam sīla ādi guṇam ca sundaraḥ janaḥ su janaḥ

original: Guṇati pakāseti sīlādiguṇasamaṅgitaṃ puggalanti guṇaṃ, sīlādiguṇaṃ. Guṇadhātu pakāsane
analyzed: pakāseti sīla ādi guṇa samaṅgitam guṇam sīla ādi guṇam guṇa dhātu pakāsane

original: a. Sujanānaṃ buddhādisappurisānaṃ guṇo sujanaguṇo, taṃ vidati jānātīti sujanaguṇavidū.
analyzed: su janānam buddha ādi sappurisānam guṇo su jana guṇo tam vidati jānāti iti su jana guṇa vidū

original: Sujana guṇasaddūpapadavidadhātu ñāṇe ū. Buddhādisappurisānaṃ sīlasamādhipaññādiguṇaṃ
analyzed: buddha ādi sappurisānam sīla samādhi paññā ādi guṇam

original: jānituṃ samattho ca bhaveyyanti attho.
analyzed: jānitum samatthaḥ ca bhaveyyanti attho

original: Māmakoti buddhādisajjanānaṃ māmako ca. Mamāyatīti māmako. Mamadhātu mānane peme vā
analyzed: buddha ādi sajja nānam ca mamāyati iti māmakaḥ mānane vā

original: ṇvu. Tassa ako. Buddhādiratanattayañca saddhammañca mānanto ca bhaveyyanti attho.
analyzed: tassa a kaḥ saddhammañca ca ca attho

original: Soti so ahaṃ. Bhaveyyanti bhavāmīti.
analyzed: sa uti saḥ aham bhaveyi anti bhavāmi iti

original: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. So ahaṃ diṭṭhadhamme paccakkhabhūte attabhāve, saddho
analyzed: ayam pana ittha saṅkhepa yojanā saḥ aham diṭṭhadhamme paccakkha bhūte atta bhāve saddho

original: saddhāya samannāgato ca, dātaṅgupeto dātassa aṅgāya kāraṇabhūtāya dhana sampattiyā
analyzed: saddhāya samannāgataḥ ca dātaṅga upetaḥ dātassa aṅgāya kāraṇa bhūtāya dhana sampattiyā

original: upeto samupeto samannāgato ca, dātabba vatthu ca, tappaṭiggāhakapuggalo ca, saddhā
analyzed: upeto samupeto samannāgato ca dātabba vatthu ca tad paṭiggāhaka puggalo ca saddhā

original: cāti tīhi aṅgehi upeto samupeto samannāgato ca vā, paramasiridharo uttamasirīdhārako
analyzed: tīhi aṅgehi upeto samupeto samannāgato ca vā parama siridharo uttama sirīdhārako

original: ca, uttamasiriṃ dhāraṇasamattho ca vā, viratto kāmaguṇesu vigataratto ca, lajjī pāpahirivanto
analyzed: ca uttama sirim dhāraṇa samatthaḥ ca vā virattaḥ kāma guṇesu vigata rattaḥ ca lajjī pāpa hirivanto

original: ca, pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇāya lajjāya sampanno ca vā, hirottappasamannāgato ca vā,
analyzed: ca pāpa jigucchana lakkhaṇāya lajjāya sampanno ca vā hira uttappa samannāgato ca vā

original: kalyāṇamitto sundaramitta sampanno ca, abhiratakusalo dānādipuññakusaladhammesu abhiramaṇo
analyzed: kalyāṇa mittaḥ sampanno ca abhirata kusalaḥ dāna ādi puñña kusala dhammesu abhiramaṇaḥ

original: ca, pañcasīlādirakkho pañcasīlādīni rakkhituṃ samattho ca, appiccho aniccho ca, rūpādikāmaguṇesu
analyzed: ca pañca sīla ādi rakkhaḥ pañca sīla ādīni rakkhitum samatthaḥ ca appicchaḥ aniccho ca rūpa ādi kāma guṇesu

original: anicchanto ca vā, appakodho dussanalakkhaṇadosato virahito ca, ativujuhadayo atieva
analyzed: an icchantaḥ ca vā appa kodhaḥ dussana lakkhaṇa dosataḥ virahito ca ati vuju hadayaḥ ati eva

original: ujucittasamannāgato ca, iddhiyā samannāgato ca, appameyyo appameyyehi sīlādiguṇehi
analyzed: uju citta samannāgato ca iddhiyā samannāgato ca appameyyaḥ appameyyehi sīla ādi guṇehi

original: sampanno ca, pāsaṃso sīlādiguṇehi buddhādisappurisānaṃ pasaṃsāraho ca, pemavāco atthabyañjanamadhuratāya
analyzed: sampanno ca pāsaṃsaḥ sīla ādi guṇehi buddha ādi sappurisānam pasaṃsā raho ca pema vācaḥ attha byañjana madhura tāya

original: buddhādisappurisehi pemitabbavācāya sampanno ca, sujanaguṇavidū buddhādisappurisānaṃ

analyzed: ca kā kathā akhila dhāraṇe

original: Vā saddo padapūraṇa mattoyeva. Catudīpissaroti pubbavideho, aparago yāno, jambudīpo,

original: vedeho, vidasaddūpapada īhadhātu vāyāme ṇa. Soyeva videho. Imaṃ dīpamupādāya sineruno

original: pubbadisabhāgattā pubbo ca so videho cāti pubbavideho, pubbadīpo.
analyzed: pubba disa bhāga ttā pubbaḥ ca saḥ videhaḥ ca ati pubbavidehaḥ pubba dīpaḥ

original: Aparagoyānoti sineruno apare pacchime bhavo aparo. Gavena yanti gacchanti etthāti

analyzed: goyānaḥ gosaddū upapada gamane ca

original: paññāto vā dīpo jambudīpo, dakkhiṇadīpo. Uttarakurūti sineruno uttare bhavā uttarā.

original: Dhammatāsiddhassa pañcasīlassa ānubhāvena kaṃ sukhaṃ urumahantaṃ etthāti kuru. Bahubbīhisamāsoyaṃ.
analyzed: dhammatā siddhassa pañcasīlassa ānubhāvena kam sukham uru mahantam ettha ati kuru

original: Kuṃ vuccati pāpaṃ. Taṃ rundhanti etthāti vā kuru. Kupubbarudhidhātu āvaraṇe kvi.

original: Dhātvantassa lopo. Sineruno uttaradisabhāgattā uttaro ca so kuru cāti uttarakuru.
analyzed: dhātu antassa lopaḥ uttara disa bhāga ttā uttaraḥ ca saḥ kuru ca ati uttarakuru

original: Uttaradīpoti catunnaṃ dīpānaṃ issaro catudīpissaro, cakkavattirājā labbhati.

original: Evaṃ lokiyahitaṃ dassetvā idāni lokuttarahitaṃ dassento āha antime dehe…pe… subbatoti

original: sambandho. Tattha pana atthakkamena vaṇṇayissāma. Antimeti carime pacchime vā. Ante
analyzed: sambandhaḥ tattha pana attha kkamena vaṇṇayissāma antimā iti carime pacchime vā ante

original: pariyosāne bhavo antimo, pacchimasarīro. Tasmiṃ. Deheti sarīre. Dihati upaciyati
analyzed: pariyosāne bhavaḥ antimo pacchima sarīro tasmin sarīre dihati

original: vaḍḍhatīti deho, sarīro. Dihadhātu upacaye ṇa. Atha vā dihati upacayati etena puññāpuññanti
analyzed: vaḍḍhati iti dehaḥ sarīraḥ upacaye atha vā dihati upacayati etena puññāpuññanti

original: deho, pacchimabhavabhūte bhabbakulaputtabhūte vā sarīreti attho. Subbatoti suṭṭhu

analyzed: paṭipannakaḥ hutvā suṭṭhu vatam paṭipannam assa ati bhāvanāyānam āruyhāti

original: bhāvanāyānaṃ āruyhāti padacchedo. Vipassanābhāvanāsaṅkhātayānaṃ āruhitvāti attho.
analyzed: bhāvanāyānam āruyha ati padacchedaḥ vipassanā bhāvanā saṅkhāta yānam āruhitvā ati atthaḥ

original: Bhāvetabbā vaḍḍhetabbāti bhāvanā. Tebhūmaka saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ. Atha vā tadārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: bhāvetabbā vaḍḍhetabbā ati bhāvanā tebhūmaka saṅkhāra ārammaṇam atha vā tad ārammaṇam

original: bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti bhāvanā, vipassanāpaññā. Bhūdhātu sattāyaṃ vaḍḍhane vā yu. Sā
analyzed: bhāveti vaḍḍheti iti bhāvanā vipassanā paññā bhū dhātu sattā idam vaḍḍhane vā

original: ca samathavipassanā bhāvanāvasena duvidhā hoti. Tattha idha pana aññaṃ setachattakanti
analyzed: ca samatha vipassanā bhāvanā vasena duvidhā hoti tattha idha pana aññam seta chattakan ti

original: saddantarasanniṭṭhānena vipassanābhāvanā adhippetā. Yanti pāpuṇanti etena nibbānanti
analyzed: sadda antara sanniṭṭhānena vipassanā bhāvanā adhippetā yanti pāpuṇanti etena nibbānanti

original: yānaṃ, aniccādivipassanāñāṇaṃ. Yādhātu gatiyaṃ yu. Bhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ yānaṃ bhāvanāyānaṃ,
analyzed: yānam anicca ādi vipassanā ñāṇam bhāvanā saṅkhātam yānam bhāvanāyānam

original: bhāvanā ca sā yānañcāti vā bhāvanāyānaṃ.
analyzed: bhāvanā ca sā yānam ca ati vā bhāvanāyānam

original: Āruyhāti ārohitvā. Pakatiyānasadisaṃ anicca dukkhaanattayānaṃ āruhitvāti attho. Aniccādilakkhaṇena
analyzed: āruyha ati ārohitvā pakati yāna sadisam anicca dukkha anatta yānam āruhitvā ati atthaḥ anicca ādi lakkhaṇena

original: hi vinā maggaphalanibbānaṃ patto nāma natthi. Tasmā bhāvanāyānamāruyhāti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: hi vinā magga phala nibbānam pattaḥ nāma natthi tasmā bhāvanāyānam āruyha ati vuttam

original: Aññanti arahattaphalaṃ. Tañhi paṭhamamaggena ādiṭṭhamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā catusaccadhammaṃ
analyzed: aññanti arahatta phalam tat hi paṭhama maggena ādiṭṭha mariyādam an atikkamitvā catu sacca dhammam

original: avabujjhatīti aññanti vuccati. Āpubbañādhātu avabodhane kvi. Āsaddo mariyādattho.
analyzed: avabujjhati iti vuccati ā pubba ñā dhātu avabodhane kvi ā saddaḥ mariyād atthaḥ

original: Setachattakanti odātātapattaṃ. Seviyatīti setaṃ, dhavalaṃ. Sidhātu sevāyaṃ ta. Kilesatapaṃ
analyzed: setachattakanti odātātapattam seviyatīti dhavalam sidhātu

original: chādetīti chattaṃ. Chadadhātu saṃvaraṇe ta. Taṃyeva chattakaṃ. Setañca taṃ chattakañcāti
analyzed: chādeti iti chattam chada dhātu saṃvaraṇe chattakam sa itam ca tam chattakam ca ati

original: setachattakaṃ. Arahattaphalaātapattaṃ labbhati. Aññaṃ arahattaphalasaṅkhātaṃ setachattakaṃ
analyzed: seta chattakam arahatta phala ātapattam labbhati aññam arahatta phala saṅkhātam seta chattakam

original: dhārento hutvāti sambandho. Samanti nibbānaṃ. Tañhi sabbaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samati vūpasamati
analyzed: dhārentaḥ hutvā iti sambandhaḥ samanti nibbānam tat hi sabbam vaṭṭa dukkham samati vūpasamati

original: nirujjhati etthāti samanti vuccati. Essatīti pāpuṇissatīti.
analyzed: nirujjhati ettha ati samanti vuccati essati iti pāpuṇissati iti

original: Idāni diṭṭhadhammikatthaṃ dassento imasmiṃ attabhāvepītiādimāha. Tattha imasmiṃ attabhāvepi
analyzed: idāni diṭṭhadhammika attham dassentaḥ imasmin atta bhāve pi iti ādim āha tattha imasmin atta bhāve pi

original: arogo ca dīghāyuko ca sabbalokehi pūjito ca bhāvanābhi ratimano ca janappiyo ca manāpo
analyzed: arogo ca dīgha āyuko ca sabba lokehi pūjito ca bhāvanābhi rati mano ca jana ppiyo ca manāpaḥ

original: ca bhaveyyāti yojanā. Attabhāvepīti ettha pisaddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena samparāyikatthaṃ

original: Arogoti sabbabyādhiviraho ca. So hi natthi rogo assāti arogoti vuccati. Dīghajīvikoti
analyzed: arogo ti sabba byādhi viraho ca so hi natthi rogaḥ assa ati arogo ti vuccati dīgha jīviko ti

original: dīghāyuko ca. So hi dīghā jīvi āyu assāti dīghajīvikoti vuccati.
analyzed: dīghāyuko ca saḥ hi dīghā jīvi āyu assa ati dīghajīviko ti vuccati

original: 33. Sabbalokehīti sabbadevamanussehi. Pūjitoti pūjitabbo ca. Bhāvanābhiratimanoti
analyzed: sabba lokehi iti sabba deva manussehi pūjitoti pūjitabbaḥ ca bhāvanā abhirati mano ti

original: samathavipassanā saṅkhātāya bhāvanāya abhiramaṇacitto ca. Janappiyoti sabbajanehi

original: piyāyitabbo ca. Manāpoti sabbasattānaṃ cittavaḍḍhanako ca bhaveyyāti sambandho.
analyzed: piyāyitabbaḥ ca manāpaḥ ti sabba sattānam citta vaḍḍhanakaḥ ca bhaveyya ati sambandho

original: Evaṃ chabbīsatiyā vandanagāthāsu ekagāthāmattampi buddhaguṇānussaraṇe phalānisaṃsaṃ

original: Ettha ca akhilasaddo sabbavācako anipphannapāṭipadiko. Atha vā khiyanaṃ khilaṃ. Khidhātu
